original: dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa zhes bya ba ni bla na med pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems yod pa la bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa zhes bya ba ni bla na med pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems yod pa la bya ba yin gyi /
translated: The ‚Äúarhat who has exhausted the contaminants‚Äù is one who has the mind of unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: dgra bcom pa gzhan zhib phyogs gcig pa la yang bya ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa gzhan zhib phyogs gcig pa la yang bya ba ni ma yin te /
translated: But it is not one who is another arhat, who is one-sidedly thorough.

original: de la mos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la mos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he does not have that aspiration.

original: de lta ci'i phyir yin zhe na /
analyzed: de lta ci'i phyir yin zhe na /
translated: Why is that so?

original: 'di ltar de dag ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: 'di ltar de dag ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúBecause they have not planted the roots of virtue,‚Äù and so on.

original: de dag ni @50a * //
analyzed: de dag ni @50a * //
translated: ‚ÄúThey‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba ni bstan ma thag pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bstan ma thag pa'o //
translated: refers to those just mentioned.

original: thos nas bsngags par yang mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni sgro 'dogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩspong bar yang mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni 'dod par mi 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: thos nas bsngags par yang mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni sgro 'dogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro // spong bar yang mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni 'dod par mi 'gyur ba ste /

original: skur pa 'debs pa'i rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skur pa 'debs pa'i rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúThey will not adopt it‚Äù because they do not have the conceptual thought of denial.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dag de lta bu yin par rung grang na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dag de lta bu yin par rung grang na /
translated: ‚ÄúHow could it be possible that the TathƒÅgatas and the bodhisattvas are like that?‚Äù

original: dgra bcom pa phung po dang khams dang skye mched skye ba dang / 'gag par lta ba can de dag go //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa phung po dang khams dang skye mched skye ba dang / 'gag par lta ba can de dag go //
translated: Those are the arhats who have the view that the aggregates, elements, and sense bases arise and cease.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /

original: nyes pa med de /
analyzed: nyes pa med de /
translated: There is no fault.

original: 'di ltar gang zag la bdag med pa mngon du byas shing /
analyzed: 'di ltar gang zag la bdag med pa mngon du byas shing /
translated: Because they have realized the selflessness of persons,

original: chos thams cad la bdag med par rtogs par 'dod pas yang dag pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab pa yin pas /
analyzed: chos thams cad la bdag med par rtogs par 'dod pas yang dag pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab pa yin pas /

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul la sgro 'dogs pa dang / skur pa 'debs pa mi byed par bsgom pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul la sgro 'dogs pa dang / skur pa 'debs pa mi byed par bsgom pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they meditate without exaggeration or denigration regarding the inconceivable mode.

original: de ltar yin pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar yin pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that so?

original: de'i phyir 'di ltar 'di bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di ltar 'di bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, In this way, it is called inconceivable... and so forth.

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: In this way means because.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa la bya'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa la bya'o //
translated: This here refers to the inconceivability of the Tathagata.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bye brag gsum po snga ma rnams 'dir gtan tshigs nyid du bstan pas bshad mi dgos te /
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bye brag gsum po snga ma rnams 'dir gtan tshigs nyid du bstan pas bshad mi dgos te /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúinconceivable‚Äù and so on refers to the three distinctions mentioned above. Since they are taught here as the very reasons, they need not be explained.

original: gang zag de gsum gyis bye brag gsum de de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin par rtogs so //
analyzed: gang zag de gsum gyis bye brag gsum de de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin par rtogs so //
translated: The three types of persons realize that the three distinctions are the inconceivable of the TathƒÅgata.

original: gal te de dag bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te de dag bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin na /
translated: If they are inconceivable,

original: de ni de lta bu yin gyi gzhan du ma yin no zhes su bsngags pa byed par 'gyur /
analyzed: de ni de lta bu yin gyi gzhan du ma yin no zhes su bsngags pa byed par 'gyur /

original: de ma yin no zhes su spong bar 'gyur /
analyzed: de ma yin no zhes su spong bar 'gyur /
translated: Who would reject them saying, ‚ÄúIt is not like that‚Äù?

original: ma bsams par ni de dag byed mi nus pas bsam dgos na /
analyzed: ma bsams par ni de dag byed mi nus pas bsam dgos na /

original: de yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul can gyi yul ma yin pas /
analyzed: de yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul can gyi yul ma yin pas /
translated: But since they are not the objects of a thought that is inconceivable,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa ni phyogs gcig cig mkhyen par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa ni phyogs gcig cig mkhyen par 'gyur ro //
translated: the TathƒÅgata would know only one part of them.

original: 'on te bsam pa la yang bsam pa ma yin par rtogs na ni de ma yin pa la der 'dzin pas 'khrul pa yin te /
analyzed: 'on te bsam pa la yang bsam pa ma yin par rtogs na ni de ma yin pa la der 'dzin pas 'khrul pa yin te /
translated: But if one understands that even thought is not thought, then that is a mistake, because one would be apprehending what is not that to be that.

original: phan tshun 'gal ba rnam pa gnyis rigs pa ma yin la /
analyzed: phan tshun 'gal ba rnam pa gnyis rigs pa ma yin la /
translated: It is not reasonable for two mutually contradictory things to be the same.üîΩAnd it would contradict what was just said.

original: gsungs ma thag pa dang yang 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhes snyam pa'i dogs pa 'di bsal ba'i phyir /
analyzed: gsungs ma thag pa dang yang 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhes snyam pa'i dogs pa 'di bsal ba'i phyir /
translated: To dispel this doubt,

original: 'jam dpal gyis gsol ba /
analyzed: 'jam dpal gyis gsol ba /
translated: Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´ said,

original: bcom @50b ldan 'das chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab cing zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: bcom @50b ldan 'das chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab cing zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: ‚ÄúBhagavƒÅn, all phenomena are inconceivable, etc.‚Äù

original: mig dang gzugs la sogs pa'i chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni bsam par 'os pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mig dang gzugs la sogs pa'i chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni bsam par 'os pa ma yin te /
translated: All phenomena such as eyes and forms are inconceivable, not suitable to be thought about,

original: gzung bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzung bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //

original: bsam du ma mchis pa zhes bya ba la bsam pa ni sems pa'o //
analyzed: bsam du ma mchis pa zhes bya ba la bsam pa ni sems pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúInconceivable‚Äù means to be thought about.

original: de dag stong pa ni bsam du ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: de dag stong pa ni bsam du ma mchis pa ste /
translated: They are empty of that, so they are inconceivable.

original: 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are not apprehended.

original: bsam du ma mchis pa'i tshul 'di la chos de dag gi nang nas su zhig bsngags pa 'am spong bar 'gyur /
analyzed: bsam du ma mchis pa'i tshul 'di la chos de dag gi nang nas su zhig bsngags pa 'am spong bar 'gyur /

analyzed: su zhig ces bya ba ni spong ba'i don yin pa'i phyir te gang yang med do zhes bya ba'i bar du yin no //

original: 'dir mdor na don 'di yin te /üîΩbyis pa rnams kyis rnam par shes pa'i rang gi ngo bo ma shes pas 'di bdag gis bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir mdor na don 'di yin te / byis pa rnams kyis rnam par shes pa'i rang gi ngo bo ma shes pas 'di bdag gis bsam par bya'o //

original: gzhan la blta'o snyam pa 'di ni rmongs pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gzhan la blta'o snyam pa 'di ni rmongs pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do zhes bya ba yin no //

original: 'di nyid bsal bar bya ba'i phyir /üîΩ'jam dpal ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi lang ba de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas zur gyis dris te /üîΩde bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar bsam gyis mi khyab cing sems pa stong pa nyid yin pa de ltar de bzhin du /
analyzed: 'di nyid bsal bar bya ba'i phyir / 'jam dpal ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi lang ba de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas zur gyis dris te / de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar bsam gyis mi khyab cing sems pa stong pa nyid yin pa de ltar de bzhin du /
translated: In order to dispel this misconception,üîΩthe Lord asks Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´ a question in a roundabout way, saying,üîΩMa√±ju≈õrƒ´, just as the TathƒÅgata is inconceivable, in the same way...

original: so so'i skye bo rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin nam zhes dris pa dang lan du /
analyzed: so so'i skye bo rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin nam zhes dris pa dang lan du /
translated: Just as the TathƒÅgata is inconceivable and the emptiness of mind is inconceivable, in the same way, are ordinary beings also inconceivable?

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das so so'i skye bo rnams kyang de bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: The Blessed One said, ‚ÄúOrdinary people are also like that.‚Äù

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa dang / so so'i skye bo gnyis dngos su bye brag ci yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa dang / so so'i skye bo gnyis dngos su bye brag ci yang ma mchis so //
translated: In that inconceivable [state], there is no actual difference between a TathƒÅgata and an ordinary person.

original: 'jam dpal de de bzhin no zhes bya ba 'dis ni rjes su gnang ba mdzad nas gtan tshigs su de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: 'jam dpal de de bzhin no zhes bya ba 'dis ni rjes su gnang ba mdzad nas gtan tshigs su de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´, it is so! With this, he gave his approval. As a reason, he said, ‚ÄúWhy is that?

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Because‚Ä¶‚Äù and so on.

original: bsam par bya ba nyid du sgro 'dogs pa'i bsam pa thams cad ni bsam gyis mi lang zhing sems pas stong pa yin te /
analyzed: bsam par bya ba nyid du sgro 'dogs pa'i bsam pa thams cad ni bsam gyis mi lang zhing sems pas stong pa yin te /
translated: All conceptual thoughts that superimpose [things] as objects of thought are inconceivable and empty of thought,

analyzed: bsam par bya ba dang sems par byed pa'i dngos po med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no entity that is an object of thought or a thinker.

original: gal te bstan ma thag pa lta bu'i don lags na /
analyzed: gal te bstan ma thag pa lta bu'i don lags na /
translated: If it is the meaning just explained,

original: 'o na ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi lang ba de bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pas bdag la 'di skad dri ba bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: 'o na ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi lang ba de bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pas bdag la 'di skad dri ba bka' stsal pa /
translated: Well then, why did the Lord ask me this question, ‚ÄúJust as the TathƒÅgata is inconceivable, so too are sentient beings inconceivable,‚Äù and so on?

original: ji ltar bka' stsal par bya ba ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar bka' stsal par bya ba ma yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it that he should not have spoken in that way?

original: de'i phyir bcom ldan @51a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir bcom ldan @51a * //

original: 'das so so'i skye bo nyid kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /üîΩso so'i skye bo de dag bsam gyis mi khyab pa lta zhog gi / gang yang de dag so sor 'gro ba kun nas slong bar byed cing rab tu 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan nyid kyi las de dang de dag sems pa'i bdag nyid yin par shin tu grags
analyzed: 'das so so'i skye bo nyid kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te / so so'i skye bo de dag bsam gyis mi khyab pa lta zhog gi / gang yang de dag so sor 'gro ba kun nas slong bar byed cing rab tu 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan nyid kyi las de dang de dag sems pa'i bdag nyid yin par shin tu grags
translated: ‚ÄúThe state of being an ordinary being, etc.‚Äù

original: pa de yang sems pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: pa de yang sems pa med pa yin no //
translated: Forget about the inconceivability of those ordinary beings, but whatever causes and reasons there are for their individual engagement in and instigation of going, those actions that are well known to have the nature of intention are not intentional.

original: 'dir gtan tshigs su bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad gang gi phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin pa de bzhin du mya ngan las 'das par sems pa yang yin no zhes bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'dir gtan tshigs su bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad gang gi phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin pa de bzhin du mya ngan las 'das par sems pa yang yin no zhes bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Here, the reason is stated: ‚ÄúBhagavƒÅn, just as all phenomena are inconceivable, so too is nirvƒÅ·πáa thought to be.‚Äù

original: gang la la dag mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad du zhugs na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gang la la dag mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad du zhugs na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚ÄúWhoever enters into nirvƒÅ·πáa . . .‚Äù and so on.

original: mya ngan las 'das par bya ba'i phyir 'bad par byed pa ni nyam thag par 'gyur 'khyams par 'gyur don med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das par bya ba'i phyir 'bad par byed pa ni nyam thag par 'gyur 'khyams par 'gyur don med par 'gyur ro //
translated: Those who strive for the sake of nirvƒÅ·πáa will be exhausted, will wander, and will be pointless.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na de'i phyir gang bsam gyis mi lang ba de nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na de'i phyir gang bsam gyis mi lang ba de nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Why is that? Therefore, it is said, ‚ÄúThat which is inconceivable . . .‚Äù and so on.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa rang bzhin nyid du gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa rang bzhin nyid du gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the very nature of the inconceivable.

analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa yang de lta bu yin par 'bad pa med par grub ste /
translated: NirvƒÅ·πáa is also like that, established without effort.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pas khyab par byed pa ni thams cad 'bad mi dgos par grub pa yin na mya ngan las 'das pa la 'jug pa'i nyam thag pa don med pa'i gnas su gyur pa ci dgos /

analyzed: theg pa gcig pa nyid du bstan cing mjug sdud pa'i phyir /

analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa la ni so so'i skye bo dang 'phags pa gnyis tha dad pa med do zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lhag ma'o //
translated: The remainder of the sentence is that there is no differentiation between ordinary beings and ƒÅryas in the inconceivable.

original: yang dag par so so'i skye bo dang 'phags pa'i chos thams cad tha dad par smra ba de dag ni de dag gi mi shes pas spungs pa yin no //
analyzed: yang dag par so so'i skye bo dang 'phags pa'i chos thams cad tha dad par smra ba de dag ni de dag gi mi shes pas spungs pa yin no //
translated: Those who speak of the reality of ordinary beings and ƒÅryas as being differentiated are a heap of ignorance.

original: de'i phyir gang dag 'di skad du /
analyzed: de'i phyir gang dag 'di skad du /
translated: Therefore, it says,

original: 'di dag ni so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams so zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di dag ni so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams so zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: ‚ÄúThese are the qualities of ordinary beings,‚Äù and so on.

original: de dag la 'og nas 'byung ba 'di skad du brjod par bya'o ;
analyzed: de dag la 'og nas 'byung ba 'di skad du brjod par bya'o ;
translated: The following is to be said to them:

analyzed: / dge ba'i bshes gnyen zhes bya ba la /

analyzed: der dge ba'i bshes gnyen byed pa ni yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / man ngag sbyin pa gnyis kyi @51b grogs byed pa'o //

analyzed: de dag kyang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / de dag gi nyan thos rnams so //
translated: Those are the buddhas, bodhisattvas, and their ≈õrƒÅvakas.

original: de dag la bsnyen bkur bya ba ni /
analyzed: de dag la bsnyen bkur bya ba ni /
translated: ‚ÄúTo serve them‚Äù

original: rnam pa thams cad du mnyes par bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du mnyes par bya ba'o //
translated: means to please them in every way.

original: dge ba'i bshes gnyen mnyes par byas pa de las phyis so so'i skye bo dang 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi rang gi ngo bo shes par 'gyur gyi /

translated: After pleasing the spiritual friend, one will later know the natures of the dharmas of ordinary beings and ƒÅryas.

analyzed: de ltar ni mi dge ba la gnas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Thus, it is the meaning of the statement, ‚ÄúOne abides in non-virtue.‚Äù

analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi mchog sems che ba nyid phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang du byas nas /

analyzed: 'jam dpal khyod de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'dod dam zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: it is said, ‚ÄúMa√±ju≈õrƒ´, do you assert that the TathƒÅgata is the foremost of all sentient beings?‚Äù

original: gal te 'di la sems can du yongs su grub cing skyes pa 'ga' zhig mchis na ni bdag de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi mchog gtso bo lags par 'tshal ba zhig na /
analyzed: gal te 'di la sems can du yongs su grub cing skyes pa 'ga' zhig mchis na ni bdag de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi mchog gtso bo lags par 'tshal ba zhig na /
translated: If there were any sentient being established here who was born, I would know the TathƒÅgata to be the foremost, the best of all sentient beings.

original: grub pa de ni ma mchis te chos thams cad ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: grub pa de ni ma mchis te chos thams cad ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But that is not the case, because all phenomena are unborn.

original: de bas na gang la ltos te gang zhig mchog lags zhes bsams pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na gang la ltos te gang zhig mchog lags zhes bsams pa'o //
translated: Therefore, with reference to what is the TathƒÅgata the foremost?‚Äù

original: spangs pa dang rtogs pa chen po nyid phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang du byas te /
analyzed: spangs pa dang rtogs pa chen po nyid phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang du byas te /
translated: With reference to the perfection of the greatness of abandonment and realization,üîΩit is said,

original: 'jam dpal khyod de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos dang ldan bar 'dod dam zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: 'jam dpal khyod de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos dang ldan bar 'dod dam zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: It is up to the end of:

original: sku dang gsungs dang thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos thun mong ma yin pa dpe med cing bdag nyid chen po dang shin tu ldan pa brnyes te mnga'o zhes bya ba'i bar du yin no //
analyzed: sku dang gsungs dang thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos thun mong ma yin pa dpe med cing bdag nyid chen po dang shin tu ldan pa brnyes te mnga'o zhes bya ba'i bar du yin no //
translated: ...having attained the inconceivable Dharma of body, speech, and mind, which is not shared in common, which is incomparable, and which is endowed with the great self.

original: ldan pa de yang gzung ba dang 'dzin par rnam par rtog pa brgyad ma lus par spangs pa yin gyis gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ldan pa de yang gzung ba dang 'dzin par rnam par rtog pa brgyad ma lus par spangs pa yin gyis gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: Moreover, that endowment is the complete abandonment of the eight types of conceptualization of object and subject, and not anything else.

original: de skad du mgon po byams pas kyang /
analyzed: de skad du mgon po byams pas kyang /
translated: Thus the Lord Maitreya also says:

original: gnod byed 'di dag zad gyur na //
analyzed: gnod byed 'di dag zad gyur na //
translated: When these harmful ones are exhausted,

original: ring zhig lon nas dbugs phyung bzhin //
analyzed: ring zhig lon nas dbugs phyung bzhin //
translated: as if sighing after a long time,

original: 'gro ba'i bde ba'i rnam pa kun //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i bde ba'i rnam pa kun //
translated: all the aspects of happiness of the world

original: sgrub byed yon tan phun sum tshogs //
analyzed: sgrub byed yon tan phun sum tshogs //
translated: are the qualities that accomplish

original: rnam pa thams cad kun ldan pa'i //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad kun ldan pa'i //
translated: endowed with all the aspects

original: 'dod pa'i 'bras bu rgya chen rnams //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i 'bras bu rgya chen rnams //
translated: the vast results of what is desired.

original: sems can chen po khyod bsten pa //
analyzed: sems can chen po khyod bsten pa //
translated: The great beings who rely on you

original: rgya mtsho chen por chu klung bzhin //
analyzed: rgya mtsho chen por chu klung bzhin //
translated: Like a river flowing into the great ocean.

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: gal te bsams pa'i chos dang ldan pa 'ga' zhig mchis na ni de ltar 'gyur na de yang ma mchis te /üîΩchos thams cad @52a * //
analyzed: gal te bsams pa'i chos dang ldan pa 'ga' zhig mchis na ni de ltar 'gyur na de yang ma mchis te / chos thams cad @52a * //
translated: If there were any dharma whatsoever that could be conceived, it would be like that. But that is not so.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa lags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa lags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because all dharmas are inconceivable.

original: de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos dang ldan no snyam du mngon par zhen pa'i rnam par rtog pa dag bskyed par mi bgyid de /
analyzed: de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos dang ldan no snyam du mngon par zhen pa'i rnam par rtog pa dag bskyed par mi bgyid de /
translated: Thus, one should not generate the conceptual thought that the TathƒÅgata possesses inconceivable dharmas.

original: bdag la sogs pa gcig pu dang / phung po la sogs pa la ldan pa gang yang mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: bdag la sogs pa gcig pu dang / phung po la sogs pa la ldan pa gang yang mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: Because it is not observed that anything whatsoever, such as a self, is possessed by anything, such as aggregates. This is the intended meaning.

original: phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa de dag gsum brnyes pa'i bstan pa po gang gi ched du 'jug pa'i phrin las bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa de dag gsum brnyes pa'i bstan pa po gang gi ched du 'jug pa'i phrin las bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the activity that engages for the sake of the teacher who has attained those three kinds of excellence, it is said:

original: 'jam dpal khyod nyan thos 'di lta bu 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas btul lo zhes bya bar 'dod dam zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: 'jam dpal khyod nyan thos 'di lta bu 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas btul lo zhes bya bar 'dod dam zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´, do you think that the TathƒÅgata has subdued these ≈õrƒÅvakas like this?

original: 'di lta bu zhes bya ba ni bsam pa dang dbang po dang dad pa'i bye brag can no //
analyzed: 'di lta bu zhes bya ba ni bsam pa dang dbang po dang dad pa'i bye brag can no //
translated: Here, like this refers to the distinctions of intention, faculties, and faith.

original: 'di dag ni zhes bya ba ni 'dus pa dang po nas da ltar 'khod pa yan chad do //
analyzed: 'di dag ni zhes bya ba ni 'dus pa dang po nas da ltar 'khod pa yan chad do //
translated: Here, these refers to those present in the first assembly up to the present.

original: nyan thos zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid kyis na theg pa gsum char gyi'am grags pa'i nyan thos kyi theg pa pa ste ;
analyzed: nyan thos zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid kyis na theg pa gsum char gyi'am grags pa'i nyan thos kyi theg pa pa ste ;
translated: ≈örƒÅvakas means those characterized by the three vehicles or the renowned ≈õrƒÅvaka vehicle.üîΩHaving subdued them, he asked, Have they been brought into the teaching, have their roots of virtue been generated, have they been ripened, and have they been liberated?

original: de dag btul te bstan pa la btsud pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / yongs su smin par byas pa dang grol bar byas sam zhes dris pa dang / gal te la la zhig bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te ;
analyzed: de dag btul te bstan pa la btsud pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / yongs su smin par byas pa dang grol bar byas sam zhes dris pa dang / gal te la la zhig bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te ;
translated: If someone says, The inconceivable realm, and so on, it is said:

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings 'dul ba ni nyes pa zlog pa dang / yon tan 'byung bar byed pa'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur na /
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings 'dul ba ni nyes pa zlog pa dang / yon tan 'byung bar byed pa'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur na /
translated: If the realm of the inconceivable were to be disciplined, it would have the characteristic of turning away from faults and producing good qualities.

original: thob na ni de ltar 'tshal na de dag ni ma mchis te /
analyzed: thob na ni de ltar 'tshal na de dag ni ma mchis te /
translated: If it were to be attained, it would be like that, but those are not present.

original: de bas na de ltar mi 'tshal lo zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na de ltar mi 'tshal lo zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is not to be sought in that way.üîΩThis is the intention.

original: de nyid gsal bar byed pa ni bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: de nyid gsal bar byed pa ni bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
translated: To clarify that very point, the BhagavƒÅn said, ‚ÄúThe arising of the Buddha‚Äù and so forth.

original: byang chub kyi phyogs dang / mya ngan las 'das pa gang la yang phan pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs dang / mya ngan las 'das pa gang la yang phan pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'am /
translated: In any of the factors of enlightenment or nirvƒÅ·πáa, there is no benefit that arises.

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa'am /
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa'am /
translated: In any of desire and so forth,

original: 'khor ba gang la yang spong zhing zhes gnod par nye bar gnas pa ma lags 'jug pa ma lags so //
analyzed: 'khor ba gang la yang spong zhing zhes gnod par nye bar gnas pa ma lags 'jug pa ma lags so //
translated: or in sa·πÉsƒÅra, there is no harm that is present or engaged.

original: 'dir gtan tshigs gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'dir gtan tshigs gang zhe na /
translated: Here, what is the reason?

original: 'di ltar dbyings 'di ni gnas pa nyid dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di ltar dbyings 'di ni gnas pa nyid dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Thus, it is said, ‚ÄúThis realm is just abiding‚Äù and so forth.

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni dbyings kyi rang gi ngo bo mngon sum du gyur pa la bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni dbyings kyi rang gi ngo bo mngon sum du gyur pa la bya'o //
translated: This refers to the direct perception of the essence of the expanse.

original: dbyings 'di ni gnas pa nyid ni gnas pa nyid dang zhes bya ba ni skye ba dang 'gag pa @52b bsal ba'o //
analyzed: dbyings 'di ni gnas pa nyid ni gnas pa nyid dang zhes bya ba ni skye ba dang 'gag pa @52b bsal ba'o //
translated: The expanse is just as it is because it is free from arising and ceasing.

original: ma 'dres pa ni gzhan dang ma 'dres pa'o //
analyzed: ma 'dres pa ni gzhan dang ma 'dres pa'o //
translated: It is unadulterated because it is not mixed with anything else.

original: de yang gang zhe na /
analyzed: de yang gang zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: 'di ltar dbyings 'di ni dbyings gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar dbyings 'di ni dbyings gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is like this: This expanse is the expanse of whatever is the expanse.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de la ni nyan thos tha dad pa nas so so'i skye bo tha dad pa'i bar du mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de la ni nyan thos tha dad pa nas so so'i skye bo tha dad pa'i bar du mi dmigs so //
translated: In that inconceivable expanse, the distinctions of the hearers up to the distinctions of the ordinary beings are not observed.

original: bar du zhes bya ba'i sgras ni rang sangs rgyas la sogs pa bsdu'o //
analyzed: bar du zhes bya ba'i sgras ni rang sangs rgyas la sogs pa bsdu'o //
translated: The word up to includes the solitary realizers and so on.

original: so so'i skye bo tha dad par mi dmigs te /
analyzed: so so'i skye bo tha dad par mi dmigs te /
translated: The distinctions of the ordinary beings are not observed.

original: mi rtogs na de las gzhan 'dul bar bya ba ga la yod ces bya ba lhag ma'o //
analyzed: mi rtogs na de las gzhan 'dul bar bya ba ga la yod ces bya ba lhag ma'o //
translated: If they are not realized, how can there be anything else to be disciplined? is the remainder.

original: thabs gang gis las de dag byed pa'i thabs de bstan pa'i ched du /
analyzed: thabs gang gis las de dag byed pa'i thabs de bstan pa'i ched du /
translated: In order to teach the method by which those actions are performed,

original: 'jam dpal khyod 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams kyi zhing bla na med pa yin par mi 'dod dam zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: 'jam dpal khyod 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams kyi zhing bla na med pa yin par mi 'dod dam zhes gsungs so //
translated: Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´, do you not accept that the TathƒÅgata is the unsurpassed field of merit?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams kyi zhing zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams kyi zhing zhes bya ba la /
translated: The TathƒÅgata is called the field of merit.

original: bsod nams skye ba dang / gnas pa'i zhing dang rten dang gzhi ste /
analyzed: bsod nams skye ba dang / gnas pa'i zhing dang rten dang gzhi ste /
translated: It is the field, basis, and support for the arising and abiding of merit.

original: sems dang ba bskyed pa'i bsod nams shin tu sogs pa dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byam dag tu 'khor ba ji tsam par sems can gyi don du spyad kyang yongs su gtugs par mi 'gyur ba'i gnas yin pa'i phyir bla na med pa ste /
analyzed: sems dang ba bskyed pa'i bsod nams shin tu sogs pa dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byam dag tu 'khor ba ji tsam par sems can gyi don du spyad kyang yongs su gtugs par mi 'gyur ba'i gnas yin pa'i phyir bla na med pa ste /
translated: It is unsurpassed because it is the basis for the merit of generating faith, which is extremely pure, to be used for the welfare of sentient beings for as long as cyclic existence lasts, without being exhausted, in the infinite buddha fields of the ten directions.

original: 'di las lhag pa gong na med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di las lhag pa gong na med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is unsurpassed because there is nothing higher than it.

original: de lta bu yin nam zhes dris pa dang lan du bcom ldan 'das dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du zhes gsol te /
analyzed: de lta bu yin nam zhes dris pa dang lan du bcom ldan 'das dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du zhes gsol te /
translated: When asked, Is it so? the reply is, Bhagavan, it is because of the non-existence of things.

original: dngos por shes pa dang bral ba'i phyir /
analyzed: dngos por shes pa dang bral ba'i phyir /
translated: Because it is free from the cognition of things.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams kyi zhing ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams kyi zhing ngo //
translated: The Thus-Gone One is a field of merit.

original: dngos po med par mkhyen pa de nyid kyis na /
analyzed: dngos po med par mkhyen pa de nyid kyis na /
translated: By knowing that things do not exist,

original: de ni bsod nams kyi zhing bla na ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: de ni bsod nams kyi zhing bla na ma mchis pa ste /
translated: he is the unsurpassed field of merit.

original: stong pa nyid mkhyen pa'i bdag nyid lags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid mkhyen pa'i bdag nyid lags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he is the embodiment of the knowledge of emptiness.

original: de skad du yang /
analyzed: de skad du yang /
translated: It is also said:üîΩThe merit of bodhicitta

original: byang chub sems kyi bsod nams dang // dam chos 'dzin pa'i bsod nams gang //üîΩstong pa nyid la brtson pa yi //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi bsod nams dang // dam chos 'dzin pa'i bsod nams gang // stong pa nyid la brtson pa yi //
translated: and the merit of upholding the sacred DharmaüîΩdo not even come close to a sixteenth

original: bcu drug char yang mi phod do //üîΩzhes gsungs so //
analyzed: bcu drug char yang mi phod do // zhes gsungs so //
translated: of the effort in emptiness.

original: yon tan gyis gang ba nyid kyang /
analyzed: yon tan gyis gang ba nyid kyang /
translated: Being filled with good qualities

original: skyon gyis ma gang ba nyid kyis zhing dam pa yin no //
analyzed: skyon gyis ma gang ba nyid kyis zhing dam pa yin no //
translated: is a pure field because it is not filled with faults.

original: 'dir ni bsod nams kyi zhing yon tan dang skyon gyis ma gang ba nyid kyis zhing dam pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir ni bsod nams kyi zhing yon tan dang skyon gyis ma gang ba nyid kyis zhing dam pa yin no //
translated: Here, a field of merit is a pure field because it is filled with good qualities and not with faults.

original: 'di ni bsod nams kyi zhing yon tan dang / skyon ma skyes par thugs su chud pa'i phyir /üîΩzhing de ni gang ba ma lags shing ma gang ba yang ma lags te /
analyzed: 'di ni bsod nams kyi zhing yon tan dang / skyon ma skyes par thugs su chud pa'i phyir /üîΩzhing de ni gang ba ma lags shing ma gang ba yang ma lags te /
translated: This field is not filled because it is understood that good qualities and faults do not arise.üîΩIt is also not unfilled because it is understood that good qualities and faults do not cease.

original: de lta bu'i dngos por dgongs pas na bla na med @53a * //
analyzed: de lta bu'i dngos por dgongs pas na bla na med @53a * //
translated: Since it is intended as such an entity, it is unsurpassed.üîΩ

original: par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: par rig par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that such a thing is unsurpassed.

original: de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to clarify that,

original: bcom ldan 'das yang de la chos gang yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das yang de la chos gang yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: the BhagavƒÅn said, ‚ÄúMoreover, there is no dharma at all that is established there,‚Äù and so on.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni zhing du 'dod pa la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni zhing du 'dod pa la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThere‚Äù refers to the field that is accepted.

original: chos gang yang yang dag par 'grub par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni mi skye ba shes pa'o //
analyzed: chos gang yang yang dag par 'grub par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni mi skye ba shes pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúNo dharma at all is established‚Äù refers to the knowledge of non-arising.

original: bas par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni zad pa shes pa ste /
analyzed: bas par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni zad pa shes pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúIs exhausted‚Äù refers to the knowledge of exhaustion.

original: de nyid sngar bstan zin to //
analyzed: de nyid sngar bstan zin to //
translated: That has already been explained above.

original: de ltar na de bsod nams kyi zhing lags so zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gzhan gyis bsal ba'i mjug sdud pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar na de bsod nams kyi zhing lags so zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gzhan gyis bsal ba'i mjug sdud pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn that way, it is a field of merit‚Äù concludes the explanation with a different aspect.

original: de la yang sa bon btab pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
analyzed: de la yang sa bon btab pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
translated: ‚ÄúMoreover, seeds planted there‚Äù and so on.

original: de la ni zhes bya ba ni zhing gi mtshan nyid bstan zin pa dag la'o //
analyzed: de la ni zhes bya ba ni zhing gi mtshan nyid bstan zin pa dag la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThere‚Äù refers to the previously explained characteristics of the field.

original: yang gi sgra ni sdud par byed pa'o //
analyzed: yang gi sgra ni sdud par byed pa'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúmoreover‚Äù is a conjunction.

original: sa bon ni dge pa'i rtsa ba'o //
analyzed: sa bon ni dge pa'i rtsa ba'o //
translated: The seed is the root of virtue.

original: btab pa ni rab tu bskyed pa ste /
analyzed: btab pa ni rab tu bskyed pa ste /
translated: The planting is the generation.

original: de lta bu'i ngo bo 'dod pa'i tshul gyis sems dang bar gyur pa'i phyir btab pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bu'i ngo bo 'dod pa'i tshul gyis sems dang bar gyur pa'i phyir btab pa yin no //
translated: The planting is the generation of the mind of enlightenment by the method of desire for such a nature.

original: rnam par mi 'phel zhing yongs su mi 'grib bo zhes bya ba ni skye ba med pa nyid du ston pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam par mi 'phel zhing yongs su mi 'grib bo zhes bya ba ni skye ba med pa nyid du ston pa yin no //
translated: It does not increase or decrease is the teaching of non-production.

original: de gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to clarify that,

original: 'jam dpal khyod kyis ci las brtsams te zhes bya ba la sogs pa dris so //
analyzed: 'jam dpal khyod kyis ci las brtsams te zhes bya ba la sogs pa dris so //
translated: the question is asked, ‚ÄúMa√±ju≈õrƒ´, what have you undertaken?‚Äù and so on.

original: gtan tshigs su bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar zhing de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: gtan tshigs su bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar zhing de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: The reason is stated, ‚ÄúBhagavat, in that way, that field is inconceivable‚Äù and so on.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni bsam pa'i gnas med par sngar bstan pa'i rnam pa lta bu yin gyi de lta ma yin na de bsod nams kyi zhing ma yin no //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni bsam pa'i gnas med par sngar bstan pa'i rnam pa lta bu yin gyi de lta ma yin na de bsod nams kyi zhing ma yin no //
translated: The inconceivable is as explained above, without being a basis for thought. Otherwise, it would not be a field of merit.

original: 'di skad bstan te de la sems dang ba bskyed pa ni de nyid kyi dngos po 'thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad bstan te de la sems dang ba bskyed pa ni de nyid kyi dngos po 'thob par 'gyur te /
translated: This is taught: the generation of the mind of enlightenment in that field results in the attainment of that very nature.

original: sa bon gyi chos ni 'bras bu las gzhan du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sa bon gyi chos ni 'bras bu las gzhan du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the nature of the seed does not change into something other than the effect.

original: de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
analyzed: de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
translated: Then, at that time, through the power of the Buddha, etc.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag tu'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag tu'o //
translated: Then means immediately.

original: de'i tshe zhing bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bstan pa'i tshe'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe zhing bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bstan pa'i tshe'o //
translated: At that time means when the field is taught as a buddha-field.

original: sangs rgyas kyi mthus zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi mthus zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis te /
translated: Through the power of the Buddha means through the blessing of the Lord.

original: de yang bdag nyid che ba nyid du bstan pas gdul bya rnams chos 'di la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang bdag nyid che ba nyid du bstan pas gdul bya rnams chos 'di la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Moreover, it is taught as greatness itself in order to engage those to be trained in this teaching.

original: rnam pa drug tu dbye ba ni byed pa'i bye brag yin te /
analyzed: rnam pa drug tu dbye ba ni byed pa'i bye brag yin te /
translated: The division into six aspects is a distinction of action.

original: shar phyogs mtho la nub phyogs dma' ba ste gcig / nub phyogs mtho la shar phyogs dma' ba dang gnyis /
analyzed: shar phyogs mtho la nub phyogs dma' ba ste gcig / nub phyogs mtho la shar phyogs dma' ba dang gnyis /
translated: The east rises and the west sets, one. The west rises and the east sets, two.

original: de bzhin du lho phyogs dang byang phyogs gnyis la gnyis so //
analyzed: de bzhin du lho phyogs dang byang phyogs gnyis la gnyis so //
translated: Similarly, the south and north each have two.

original: dbus dang mtha' gnyis la gnyis te rnam pa drug @53b go ;
analyzed: dbus dang mtha' gnyis la gnyis te rnam pa drug @53b go ;
translated: The middle and the two extremes are twofold, thus there are six aspects.

original: / dge slong khri drug stong zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba la gang yang 'khor 'dus pa'i tshe /
analyzed: / dge slong khri drug stong zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba la gang yang 'khor 'dus pa'i tshe /
translated: The statement ‚Äúsixteen thousand monks‚Äù and so on, means that when the assembly of the retinue gathered,

original: dge slong stong tshang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni de dag dgra bcom pa'i dbang du byas so zhes bya bar shes so //
analyzed: dge slong stong tshang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni de dag dgra bcom pa'i dbang du byas so zhes bya bar shes so //
translated: the statement ‚Äúa full thousand monks‚Äù and so on, means that they were in terms of the arhats.

original: len pa med par zag pa rnams las zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: len pa med par zag pa rnams las zhes bya ba la /
translated: The statement ‚Äúwithout grasping, they were liberated from the defilements‚Äù means the following.

original: zag pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: zag pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
translated: There are four types of defilements:

original: 'dod pa'i zag pa dang / srid pa'i zag pa dang / ma rig pa'i zag pa dang / lta ba'i zag pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i zag pa dang / srid pa'i zag pa dang / ma rig pa'i zag pa dang / lta ba'i zag pa'o //
translated: the defilement of desire, the defilement of existence, the defilement of ignorance, and the defilement of views.

original: 'dod pa la sogs pa de dag nyid nye bar len pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dod pa la sogs pa de dag nyid nye bar len pa yin te /
translated: Desire and so on are the very grasping,

original: ma rig pas mdongs par gyur cing /
analyzed: ma rig pas mdongs par gyur cing /
translated: because those who are blinded by ignorance and

original: lta ba'i chus brlan pa'i bdag tu mngon par zhen pa dag ni phung po la sogs pa len pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lta ba'i chus brlan pa'i bdag tu mngon par zhen pa dag ni phung po la sogs pa len pa'i phyir ro //
translated: whose self-habit is moistened by the water of views grasp the aggregates and so on.

original: de lta bur len pa med pas /
analyzed: de lta bur len pa med pas /
translated: Since they do not grasp in that way,

original: len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems bral zhing rnam par grol bar gyur to //
analyzed: len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems bral zhing rnam par grol bar gyur to //
translated: His mind was liberated from the defilements without grasping.

original: dge slong ma bdun brgya dang zhes bya ba ni gong ma dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: dge slong ma bdun brgya dang zhes bya ba ni gong ma dang sbyar ro //
translated: And seven hundred nuns: this is connected with the above.

original: yang na 'og ma dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: yang na 'og ma dang sbyar ro //
translated: Or it is connected with the following.

original: rdul dang bral zhing zhes bya ba ni glo bur ba'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdul dang bral zhing zhes bya ba ni glo bur ba'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Free from dust: because of being free from adventitious signs.

original: dri ma med pa zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i gnas ngan len gyi dri ma dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dri ma med pa zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i gnas ngan len gyi dri ma dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Stainless: because of being free from the stain of innate negative tendencies.

original: chos la zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa la'o //
analyzed: chos la zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa la'o //
translated: With regard to phenomena: with regard to form and so on.

original: chos kyi mig ces bya ba ni stong pa nyid la sogs pa'i chos kyi yul can gyi ye shes skyes shing byung ba ste /
analyzed: chos kyi mig ces bya ba ni stong pa nyid la sogs pa'i chos kyi yul can gyi ye shes skyes shing byung ba ste /
translated: The eye of Dharma: the wisdom that is the object of phenomena such as emptiness has arisen and occurred.

original: yul 'di la mtshan ma'i gnas ngan len dang bral bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go / dog sa cher g-yos pa rgyun du byung ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags rgyu de'i grogs bgyid pa'i rkyen gang lags zhes dris pa dang lan du /
analyzed: yul 'di la mtshan ma'i gnas ngan len dang bral bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go / dog sa cher g-yos pa rgyun du byung ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags rgyu de'i grogs bgyid pa'i rkyen gang lags zhes dris pa dang lan du /
translated: What is the cause of this great earthquake that has occurred continuously? What is the condition that assists that cause?

original: kun dga' bo bsod nams kyi zhing bstan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: kun dga' bo bsod nams kyi zhing bstan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In response, it is said, ‚ÄúƒÄnanda, this Dharma discourse called The Teaching on the Field of Merit‚Ä¶‚Äù

original: 'dis sam 'dir bsod nams kyi zhing bstan pas na bsod nams kyi zhing bstan pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis sam 'dir bsod nams kyi zhing bstan pas na bsod nams kyi zhing bstan pa'o //
translated: It is called ‚ÄúThe Teaching on the Field of Merit‚Äù because the field of merit is taught by this or in this.

original: sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma smos pa rnams kyis te /
analyzed: sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma smos pa rnams kyis te /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúeven the previous buddhas‚Äù refers to those who are mentioned by name.

original: grangs kyi bye brag ma bstan pa'i phyir dang / 'jig pa'i rgyu skyon thams cad las rnam par grol ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bzhugs yul ni 'jig pa'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: grangs kyi bye brag ma bstan pa'i phyir dang / 'jig pa'i rgyu skyon thams cad las rnam par grol ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bzhugs yul ni 'jig pa'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the specific number is not taught, and because the abodes of the tathƒÅgatas, who are completely free from all the faults that are the causes of destruction, are not places that are destroyed.

original: bskal pa bzang po la 'od srungs la sogs pas 'di bshad do zhes 'chad pa ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: bskal pa bzang po la 'od srungs la sogs pas 'di bshad do zhes 'chad pa ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not reasonable to explain that this was taught by Kasyapa and so on in the Bhadrakalpa.

original: de 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi snga ma dag kyang yin no //üîΩde lta @54a * //
analyzed: de 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi snga ma dag kyang yin no // de lta @54a * //
translated: Because it was not only them, but also the former ones.

original: ma yin na rol pas chub pa las 'di skad du /üîΩsangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag ni //
analyzed: ma yin na rol pas chub pa las 'di skad du / sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag ni //
translated: If it were not so, how could it be consistent with the following passage from the Sutra of Perfect Awakening?üîΩI recall that in the past

original: dgu bcu rtsa gcig bdag sngon dran //üîΩdrang srong zhes bya'i tshal mchog 'dir //
analyzed: dgu bcu rtsa gcig bdag sngon dran // drang srong zhes bya'i tshal mchog 'dir //
translated: there were ninety-one thousand BuddhasüîΩwho turned the wheel of the holy Dharma

original: chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa bskor //üîΩzhes 'byung ba dang / ji ltar rjes su mthun par 'gyur /
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa bskor // zhes 'byung ba dang / ji ltar rjes su mthun par 'gyur /
translated: in this supreme forest called ·πö·π£ipatana.

original: sa phyogs 'di nyid du zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa de ni sa phyogs gzhan du ma yin no //
analyzed: sa phyogs 'di nyid du zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa de ni sa phyogs gzhan du ma yin no //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúin this very place‚Äù means not in another place.

original: gsungs te zhes bya ba ni bshad de'o //
analyzed: gsungs te zhes bya ba ni bshad de'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIt is said‚Äù means it is explained.

original: 'di'i rgyu ni de yin no zhes bya ba ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs te bshad pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: 'di'i rgyu ni de yin no zhes bya ba ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs te bshad pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúThis is its cause‚Äù means the characteristic of the former Tathagatas dwelling and explaining.

original: rkyen ni de yin no zhes bya ba ni da ltar bzhugs te 'chad pa'o //
analyzed: rkyen ni de yin no zhes bya ba ni da ltar bzhugs te 'chad pa'o //
translated: The condition is the present existence of the Buddha.

original: de ltar na ji ltar bgrod par bya bar gshegs pa dang / ji ltar thugs su chud pa gsung ba dang / gang gi ched du 'jug pa de thob pa dang / de'i phrin las sems can 'dul ba gang yin pa dang / de'i thabs bsod nams kyi zhing ste /
analyzed: de ltar na ji ltar bgrod par bya bar gshegs pa dang / ji ltar thugs su chud pa gsung ba dang / gang gi ched du 'jug pa de thob pa dang / de'i phrin las sems can 'dul ba gang yin pa dang / de'i thabs bsod nams kyi zhing ste /
translated: Thus, the Buddha is the one who has gone to the destination, the one who teaches what he has understood, the one who has attained the goal for which he entered, the one whose activity is the training of sentient beings, and the one who is the field of merit for those who seek the goal.

original: de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa yin no //
translated: These are the teachings of the Buddha.

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi dmigs pa'i rnam pa bstan pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi dmigs pa'i rnam pa bstan pa rdzogs so /

original: // / de'i 'bras bu thob pa'i dbang du byas te /
analyzed: // / de'i 'bras bu thob pa'i dbang du byas te /
translated: From the perspective of attaining the result,

original: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //

analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni bsam par mi nus pa'o //

original: dpal ni sku dang gsung dang thugs phun sum tshogs pa ste /
analyzed: dpal ni sku dang gsung dang thugs phun sum tshogs pa ste /

analyzed: gtan tshigs su 'di ltar 'di'i spobs pa gang dang gang lags pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

analyzed: gang dang gang lags pa'i spobs pa ni sems la snang ba ste /

analyzed: 'jam dpal dge slong sha ra dva ti'i bus tshig ji skad smras pa de bzhin te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa ni /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rjes su gnang ba mdzad pa yin te /

original: yang gang bsam gyis mi khyab pa ma lags pa ni gang ci yang ma mchis so zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: yang gang bsam gyis mi khyab pa ma lags pa ni gang ci yang ma mchis so zhes gsungs so //
translated: If it is inconceivable, it is not eloquence.üîΩIf it is inconceivable,

original: yang zhes bya ba ni snga ma las phye ste 'thad pa gzhan bstan pa ste /
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba ni snga ma las phye ste 'thad pa gzhan bstan pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúAlso‚Äù indicates another explanation, a different proof from the previous one.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa ma lags pa'i dngos po ni gang ci yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa ma lags pa'i dngos po ni gang ci yang ma mchis so //
translated: There is no thing whatsoever that is not inconceivable.

original: de ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni khyab par byed pa nyid yin par bstan nas 'chad pa ni sgra'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni khyab par byed pa nyid yin par bstan nas 'chad pa ni sgra'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Thus, having taught that the inconceivable is the pervader, the explanation is as follows:

original: rtsod pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid yin par bsgrub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rtsod pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid yin par bsgrub pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to prove that sound, which is the basis of dispute, is inconceivable,

original: bcom ldan 'das sgra thams cad ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das sgra thams cad ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: the BhagavƒÅn said, ‚ÄúAll sounds are inconceivable.‚Äù

original: zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po'i rgyu las byung ba la sogs par dbye ba'i sgra rnam pa brgyad po de dag thams cad ni bsam par mi nus pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste /
analyzed: zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po'i rgyu las byung ba la sogs par dbye ba'i sgra rnam pa brgyad po de dag thams cad ni bsam par mi nus pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste /
translated: All those eight types of sound, which arise from the cause of the appropriated great elements, and so on, are inconceivable because they cannot be conceived.

original: bsam pa'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsam pa'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: They are not objects of conception.

original: sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid yin par bstan nas sgra 'chad par byed pa nyid ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid yin par bstan nas sgra 'chad par byed pa nyid ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Having taught that sound is inconceivable, in order to teach that it is not a revealer,

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgra ni ston par nus pa yang ma yin no zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgra ni ston par nus pa yang ma yin no zhes gsungs te /
translated: it is said that inconceivable sound is not able to reveal.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i sgra ni ston par nus pa ma yin gzhan la khong du chud par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i sgra ni ston par nus pa ma yin gzhan la khong du chud par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: Sound that has an inconceivable nature is not able to reveal, it does not cause others to understand,

original: rang rig pa'i mthar thug pa ni gzhan la rig par mi byed de /
analyzed: rang rig pa'i mthar thug pa ni gzhan la rig par mi byed de /
translated: because the ultimate of reflexive awareness does not cause others to know.

original: de dag ni don dam pa yin no //
analyzed: de dag ni don dam pa yin no //
translated: Those are the ultimate.

original: rtogs pa po dang ston par bye dpa'i tha snyad ni ma brtags pa gcig pu na dga' ba kun rdzob yin te /
analyzed: rtogs pa po dang ston par bye dpa'i tha snyad ni ma brtags pa gcig pu na dga' ba kun rdzob yin te /
translated: The conventions of the knower and the revealer are, when left unanalyzed, the mere delight of the relative,

original: rtogs pa po dang / ston par byed pa yin par mngon par zhen pa'i don byas pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rtogs pa po dang / ston par byed pa yin par mngon par zhen pa'i don byas pa'i phyir /
translated: because the object of the conception of the knower and the revealer has been accomplished.

original: rab rib can gnyis kyis zla ba gnyis mthong ste /
analyzed: rab rib can gnyis kyis zla ba gnyis mthong ste /
translated: Two people with eye disease see two moons.

original: ston par byed pa bzhin no //
analyzed: ston par byed pa bzhin no //
translated: It is like the revealer.

original: 'dir ni de lta bu bsam du med pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir ni de lta bu bsam du med pa'o //
translated: Here, that is inconceivable.

original: de skad du 'phags @55a * //
analyzed: de skad du 'phags @55a * //
translated: It is said in the nobleüîΩ

original: pa thogs med kyis kyang /
analyzed: pa thogs med kyis kyang /
translated: Thus, the noble Asanga also says,

original: yi ge phan tshun 'brel pa las //
analyzed: yi ge phan tshun 'brel pa las //
translated: From the mutual connection of the letters,

original: 'brel pa can ni don de yin //
analyzed: 'brel pa can ni don de yin //
translated: the connected meaning is known.

original: 'brel pa can gyi ngo bo las //
analyzed: 'brel pa can gyi ngo bo las //
translated: From the nature of the connected meaning,

original: brtags yin de las gzhan du min //
analyzed: brtags yin de las gzhan du min //
translated: the object is imagined, not otherwise.

original: rjod par byed pa med par ni //
analyzed: rjod par byed pa med par ni //
translated: Without the expression,

original: brjod par bya la shes mi 'jug //
analyzed: brjod par bya la shes mi 'jug //
translated: the object of expression is not known.

original: rjod par byed pa 'ang 'gal ba'i phyir ;
analyzed: rjod par byed pa 'ang 'gal ba'i phyir ;
translated: And because the expression is also contradictory,

original: / de bas thams cad brjod du med //üîΩces gsungs so //
analyzed: / de bas thams cad brjod du med // ces gsungs so //
translated: therefore, everything is inexpressible.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa 'du ba'i mdo las kyang /üîΩgzugs kyi ngo bo bstan mi nus //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa 'du ba'i mdo las kyang / gzugs kyi ngo bo bstan mi nus //
translated: And in the TathƒÅgataguhyas≈´tra,üîΩThe essence of form cannot be shown.

original: gzugs kyi ngo bo bsam mi nus //
analyzed: gzugs kyi ngo bo bsam mi nus //
translated: The essence of form cannot be thought.

original: gzugs kyi ngo bo yi ge bral //
analyzed: gzugs kyi ngo bo yi ge bral //
translated: The essence of form is free from letters.

original: yi ges ston pa gzugs la yin //
analyzed: yi ges ston pa gzugs la yin //
translated: The teaching by letters is about form.

original: sgra yi ngo bo bstan mi nus //
analyzed: sgra yi ngo bo bstan mi nus //
translated: The essence of sound cannot be shown.

original: sgra yi ngo bo bsam mi nus //
analyzed: sgra yi ngo bo bsam mi nus //
translated: The essence of sound cannot be thought.

original: sgra yi ngo bo yi ge bral //
analyzed: sgra yi ngo bo yi ge bral //
translated: The essence of sound is free from letters.

original: yi ges ston pa sgra la yin //
analyzed: yi ges ston pa sgra la yin //
translated: The teaching by letters is about sound.

original: de bzhin du dri la sogs pa dang / mig la sogs pa la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du dri la sogs pa dang / mig la sogs pa la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: And so on, in the same way, it should be applied to smell and so on, and to the eyes and so on.

original: de dag ni 'dir ston pa'i tshul gyi rnam pa yin no //
analyzed: de dag ni 'dir ston pa'i tshul gyi rnam pa yin no //
translated: These are the aspects of the method of teaching.

original: de'i 'bras bu thob pa bshad zin to //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu thob pa bshad zin to //
translated: The attainment of the result has been explained.

original: da ni rjes su myong ba 'chad par byed pa ston te /
analyzed: da ni rjes su myong ba 'chad par byed pa ston te /
translated: Now, the teaching of the explanation of the experience is stated.

original: de yang gang zhe na /
analyzed: de yang gang zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: byang chub kyi phyogs de dag bsgom pa na nyams su myong ba de'i bye brag 'chad cing sgrogs pa ni de rjes su myong ba rnam par 'chad pa yin no //
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs de dag bsgom pa na nyams su myong ba de'i bye brag 'chad cing sgrogs pa ni de rjes su myong ba rnam par 'chad pa yin no //
translated: The explanation of the experience is the explanation and proclamation of the distinctions of that experience in the cultivation of those factors of enlightenment.

original: de dag kyang ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de dag kyang ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why are they?

original: las dang po pa 'jug par bya ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: las dang po pa 'jug par bya ba'i phyir te /
translated: In order to engage the beginner,

original: dang por rnam par rtog pa 'byung ba yin la /
analyzed: dang por rnam par rtog pa 'byung ba yin la /
translated: first, the arising of conceptualization occurs.

original: de nas sbyor ba bar chad dang bcas pa dang / rtag tu sbyor ba dang / bar ma chad par sbyor ba yin no //
analyzed: de nas sbyor ba bar chad dang bcas pa dang / rtag tu sbyor ba dang / bar ma chad par sbyor ba yin no //
translated: Then, there is the practice with interruptions, the constant practice, and the uninterrupted practice.

original: de'i 'og tu ni de'i bdag nyid du gyur te /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu ni de'i bdag nyid du gyur te /
translated: After that, it becomes their nature.

original: de nas brtson pa mi 'dor ba yin pas spro ba med par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de nas brtson pa mi 'dor ba yin pas spro ba med par mi bya'o //
translated: Then, since one does not abandon diligence, one should not be discouraged.

original: de bstan pa'i ched du 'jam dpal khyod bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug gam zhes dris te /
analyzed: de bstan pa'i ched du 'jam dpal khyod bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug gam zhes dris te /
translated: In order to demonstrate that, he asks, ‚ÄúO Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´, do you enter into the concentration of the inconceivable?‚Äù

original: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa rlom sems can yin yang ting nge 'dzin ma yin no zhes bya ba ni dris pa'i don yin no //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa rlom sems can yin yang ting nge 'dzin ma yin no zhes bya ba ni dris pa'i don yin no //
translated: The meaning of the question is that even though one enters into concentration, one does not enter into concentration if one is conceited.

original: don de nyid bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te zhes bya bas ston to //
analyzed: don de nyid bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te zhes bya bas ston to //
translated: The meaning of that is demonstrated by the words, ‚ÄúNo, Blessed One.‚Äù

original: de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to make that clear, he says,

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bdag snyoms par mi 'jug go zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bdag snyoms par mi 'jug go zhes gsungs te /
translated: ‚ÄúI do not enter into the concentration of the inconceivable.‚Äù

original: 'di ni dam bcas pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni dam bcas pa yin no //
translated: This is the thesis.

original: 'dir gtan tshigs ni de ci'i slad du zhe na /üîΩ'dir bdag nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dir gtan tshigs ni de ci'i slad du zhe na / 'dir bdag nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
translated: Here the reason is, ‚ÄúWhy is that?‚ÄùüîΩHere he says, ‚ÄúBecause I do not consider myself to be a bodhisattva.‚Äù

original: gsungs pa'i tshul des ni sems pa dang bral zhing bdag nyid sems par byed @55b pa nyid spong bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gsungs pa'i tshul des ni sems pa dang bral zhing bdag nyid sems par byed @55b pa nyid spong bar byed pa yin no //
translated: By this statement, he rejects the idea that he is a bodhisattva and that he is himself conceited.

original: bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag bsam du rung ba lags na ni bdag bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug go zhes bya ba ni bdag gi bsam pa yang spong bar byed de chos thams cad shin tu ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag bsam du rung ba lags na ni bdag bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug go zhes bya ba ni bdag gi bsam pa yang spong bar byed de chos thams cad shin tu ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is the rejection of my imagination, because all phenomena are utterly non-arisen.

original: snyoms par 'jug po'am snyoms par 'jug par bya ba'i chos gang bsam par bya ba ste gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug po'am snyoms par 'jug par bya ba'i chos gang bsam par bya ba ste gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: There is no phenomenon whatsoever that is imagined, whether it is an agent of concentration or an object of concentration.

original: gang gi tshe de ltar bsam par bya ba gang yang ma mchis na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe de ltar bsam par bya ba gang yang ma mchis na /
translated: When there is no phenomenon whatsoever that is imagined,

original: de'i tshe su zhig ting nge 'dzin 'di la snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur /
analyzed: de'i tshe su zhig ting nge 'dzin 'di la snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur /
translated: then who would enter into this concentration?

original: ting nge 'dzin la chos de gnyi ga mi rigs par mjug bsdu ba'i phyir /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la chos de gnyi ga mi rigs par mjug bsdu ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to conclude that both of these are illogical in concentration,

original: bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bgyi bde ni bsam du mchis pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bgyi bde ni bsam du mchis pa /
translated: the Blessed One said, ‚ÄúThe so-called inconceivable concentration is conceivable,

original: bsam gyis mi lang ba lags na zhes bya ba de'i don ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi lang ba lags na zhes bya ba de'i don ni bshad zin to //
translated: it is inconceivable.‚Äù The meaning of that has been explained.

original: de bas na ji ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bgyi zhes 'byung pa la /
analyzed: de bas na ji ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bgyi zhes 'byung pa la /
translated: Therefore, how should one enter into the concentration of the inconceivable?

original: de bas na zhes bya ba ni de lta na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bas na zhes bya ba ni de lta na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore means thus.

original: ji ltar zhes bya ba ni spong ba ste /
analyzed: ji ltar zhes bya ba ni spong ba ste /
translated: How means rejection.

original: bdag nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rang bzhin lags la /
analyzed: bdag nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rang bzhin lags la /
translated: I myself am of the nature of the inconceivable.

original: bdag las tha mi dad pa'i rang gi ngo bo bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la ji ltar snyoms par 'jug par bgyi /
analyzed: bdag las tha mi dad pa'i rang gi ngo bo bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la ji ltar snyoms par 'jug par bgyi /
translated: How should I enter into the concentration of the inconceivable, whose nature is not different from myself?

original: ci khyod gcig pu de ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin nam /
analyzed: ci khyod gcig pu de ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin nam /
translated: Is it that you alone are thus inconceivable?

original: 'jig rten pa thams cad kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin na /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa thams cad kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin na /
translated: If all worldly beings are inconceivable,

original: de dag ji ltar khyod bzhin du ma gyur ce na /
analyzed: de dag ji ltar khyod bzhin du ma gyur ce na /
translated: why are they not like you?

original: de'i phyir de ltar lags kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das bdag sngon las dang po pa'i tshe na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar lags kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das bdag sngon las dang po pa'i tshe na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, although it is so, the BhagavƒÅn says, ‚ÄúWhen I was a beginner,‚Äù and so on.

original: ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i snga rol sngon bdag bsgom pa la sbyor ba'i las dang po'i tshe /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i snga rol sngon bdag bsgom pa la sbyor ba'i las dang po'i tshe /
translated: Before attaining concentration, when one is a beginner and is applying oneself to meditation,

original: nyan pa dang / sems pa'i dus na ni snyoms par 'jug pa po dang snyoms par 'jug par bya ba dang / snyoms par 'jug par sgro 'dogs par bgyid cing /
analyzed: nyan pa dang / sems pa'i dus na ni snyoms par 'jug pa po dang snyoms par 'jug par bya ba dang / snyoms par 'jug par sgro 'dogs par bgyid cing /
translated: at the time of listening and reflection, one superimposes the one who enters into meditative equipoise, the object of meditative equipoise, and the meditative equipoise itself.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug go snyam du rnam par rtog pa de lta bu shin tu byung lags so //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug go snyam du rnam par rtog pa de lta bu shin tu byung lags so //
translated: One thinks, I will enter into the inconceivable meditative stabilization, and such a conception arises.

original: ting nge 'dzin thob nas de ltar ni bdag bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug go snyam du yang de la sems pa kun 'byung zhing skye ba ma mchis so //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thob nas de ltar ni bdag bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug go snyam du yang de la sems pa kun 'byung zhing skye ba ma mchis so //
translated: But after attaining concentration, the thought, I am entering into the inconceivable meditative stabilization, does not arise.

original: dang por rnam par rtog pa de lta bu 'byung du zin kyang //
analyzed: dang por rnam par rtog pa de lta bu 'byung du zin kyang //
translated: Although such a conception arises at first,

original: bsgom pa goms pas bdag bzhin du ma mchis par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsgom pa goms pas bdag bzhin du ma mchis par 'gyur ro //
translated: through cultivating meditation, it will disappear like the self.

original: de bas na bsgom pa la brtson par byos shig ces bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na bsgom pa la brtson par byos shig ces bstan pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is taught, Strive in meditation!

original: dpes gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: dpes gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to clarify this by means of an example,

original: @56a * // bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste /
analyzed: @56a * // bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste /
translated: the Lord said,

original: dper na 'phong gi slob dpon ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: dper na 'phong gi slob dpon ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: For example, a master archer...

original: gzhu 'dis mda' 'phen zhes pa'i slob dpon zhes bya ste /
analyzed: gzhu 'dis mda' 'phen zhes pa'i slob dpon zhes bya ste /
translated: With this bow, I will shoot an arrow is the master.

original: de ni don gsal lo //
analyzed: de ni don gsal lo //
translated: The meaning of that is clear.

original: skra la zhes pa ni spu'i nyag ma la'o //
analyzed: skra la zhes pa ni spu'i nyag ma la'o //
translated: Hair refers to a hair-tip.

original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag sngon ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dpes don la sbyor bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag sngon ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dpes don la sbyor bar byed pa'o //
translated: Bhagavan, in the same way, I previously... and so on, connects the meaning with the example.

original: bdag sngon ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug go snyam du de ltar bsam par gyur to zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang 'brel pa de'i tshe ting nge 'dzin ma yin pas ldog par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: bdag sngon ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug go snyam du de ltar bsam par gyur to zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang 'brel pa de'i tshe ting nge 'dzin ma yin pas ldog par bya ba yin no //
translated: I previously thought, 'I will enter into the inconceivable samadhi.' This is the connection with the counteragent, and at that time, it is to be reversed because it is not samadhi.

original: gang gi tshe bdag gis ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs nas zhes bya ba ni rjes su 'gro ba bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe bdag gis ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs nas zhes bya ba ni rjes su 'gro ba bstan pa yin te /
translated: When I entered into that samadhi... This shows the forward order.

original: ting nge 'dzin 'di lan mang du gnas shing gnas pa de'i tshe de'i dus na /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin 'di lan mang du gnas shing gnas pa de'i tshe de'i dus na /
translated: When I dwell in this meditative absorption many times, at that time,

original: bdag ting nge 'dzin 'di la slar yang 'di snyam du byang chub kyi don du ting nge 'dzin 'dis gnas par bya'o snyam du mi sems so //
analyzed: bdag ting nge 'dzin 'di la slar yang 'di snyam du byang chub kyi don du ting nge 'dzin 'dis gnas par bya'o snyam du mi sems so //
translated: I do not think, ‚ÄòI will dwell in this meditative absorption again for the sake of awakening.‚Äô

original: khyod kyis gtan tshigs gang gis de ltar 'gyur zhe na de'i phyir /
analyzed: khyod kyis gtan tshigs gang gis de ltar 'gyur zhe na de'i phyir /
translated: For what reason does that happen? Therefore it is said:

original: gang dang gang gi tshe ting nge 'dzin 'dis gnas pa de dang de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang dang gang gi tshe ting nge 'dzin 'dis gnas pa de dang de'i tshe /
translated: Whenever I dwell in this meditative absorption, at that time,

original: ting nge 'dzin 'dis gdags su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin 'dis gdags su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o zhes gsungs te /
translated: because this meditative absorption is not something that can be designated.

original: de dang de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni rim pa mang bar ston pa yin no //
analyzed: de dang de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni rim pa mang bar ston pa yin no //
translated: ‚ÄòAt that time‚Äô shows the many stages.

original: ting nge 'dzin 'di gdags su ma mchis pa zhes bya ba ni 'di dang de'o snyam pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba dang bstan du med pa dang mthong ba med pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yin no //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin 'di gdags su ma mchis pa zhes bya ba ni 'di dang de'o snyam pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba dang bstan du med pa dang mthong ba med pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yin no //
translated: ‚ÄòThis meditative absorption is not something that can be designated‚Äô means being free from the conceptualization ‚Äòthis is that,‚Äô and being imperceptible and invisible.

original: ting nge 'dzin 'di'i rnam pa shin tu zhi ba'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i ched du skabs dbye ba'i phyir /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin 'di'i rnam pa shin tu zhi ba'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i ched du skabs dbye ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to explain the characteristic of the extreme peace of this samadhi, he opens the discussion:

original: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'dis gnas pa'i tshe 'di la yid mi rton na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsol to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'dis gnas pa'i tshe 'di la yid mi rton na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsol to //
translated: When the Bhagavat, the youthful Manjusri, abides in this inconceivable samadhi, he does not rely on this mind.

original: 'chad pa'i tshe dris pa na ting nge 'dzin 'di la 'di ltar 'jam dpal ni yid mi rton te /
analyzed: 'chad pa'i tshe dris pa na ting nge 'dzin 'di la 'di ltar 'jam dpal ni yid mi rton te /
translated: When he is asked to explain, he says that Manjusri does not rely on this samadhi in this way:

original: gsang ba dag 'di ltar gsal por mi ston to //
analyzed: gsang ba dag 'di ltar gsal por mi ston to //
translated: He does not teach the secret in this way, so clearly.

original: de bas na bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba bgyid do zhes ston to //
analyzed: de bas na bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba bgyid do zhes ston to //
translated: Therefore, I ask the Bhagavat.

original: yid mi rton pa'i gtan tshigs su bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'dis de'i bdag nyid du gyur par gnas pa'i tshe zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: yid mi rton pa'i gtan tshigs su bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'dis de'i bdag nyid du gyur par gnas pa'i tshe zhes gsungs te /
translated: The reason for his lack of reliance is stated: When he abides in the nature of this inconceivable samadhi.

original: dris pa la shin tu zab mo kho na 'chad par byed do //
analyzed: dris pa la shin tu zab mo kho na 'chad par byed do //
translated: He explains the question in terms of the extremely profound.

original: bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge @56b 'dzin 'di bas ches zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin gzhan lta mchis sam zhes bya ba 'dis ting nge 'dzin 'di'i rnam pa ni zhi ba nyid yin par bstan to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge @56b 'dzin 'di bas ches zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin gzhan lta mchis sam zhes bya ba 'dis ting nge 'dzin 'di'i rnam pa ni zhi ba nyid yin par bstan to //
translated: The Blessed One, is there any other concentration more peaceful than this inconceivable concentration? By this he shows that the aspect of this concentration is peacefulness.

original: don de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: don de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to clarify that very meaning,

original: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis kyang btsun pa sha radva ti'i bu 'di skad du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis kyang btsun pa sha radva ti'i bu 'di skad du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba nas /
translated: the noble Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´ also said, Venerable ≈öƒÅradvatƒ´putra, it is said 'inconceivable concentration.'

original: khyod kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di zhi ba yin par ji ltar shes zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs so //
analyzed: khyod kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di zhi ba yin par ji ltar shes zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs so //
translated: How do you know that this inconceivable concentration is peaceful?

original: ji ltar shes zhes bya ba ni spong ba'o //
analyzed: ji ltar shes zhes bya ba ni spong ba'o //
