analyzed: de'i tshe kun nas slong ba la sogs pa'i spyod pa dang ldan pa'i phyir /
translated: At that time, because of being endowed with the conduct of motivation and so forth,

original: 'di chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi rgyu mthun par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi rgyu mthun par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: this would not be the natural outflow of non-apprehending wisdom.

original: de ltar na skye ba med pa'i bdag nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mnyan nas /
analyzed: de ltar na skye ba med pa'i bdag nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mnyan nas /
translated: Thus, having listened to this perfection of wisdom, which is of the nature of non-arising,

original: shin tu legs par shes par bya ste /
analyzed: shin tu legs par shes par bya ste /
translated: it should be understood very well.

original: lhag par mos par bya la /
analyzed: lhag par mos par bya la /
translated: It should be greatly aspired to.

original: bsam pas shin tu gtan la phab ste /
analyzed: bsam pas shin tu gtan la phab ste /
translated: It should be ascertained well by thought.

original: goms pas zhi gnas kyi spyod pa la yang sbyar bar bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: goms pas zhi gnas kyi spyod pa la yang sbyar bar bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate that it should also be applied to the conduct of meditative serenity through cultivation,üîΩhe says:

original: 'jam dpal gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin la @75a * //
analyzed: 'jam dpal gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin la @75a * //
translated: having attained the bodhisattva's meditative absorption,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: should practice and cultivate it.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhes bya ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su dbang bskur ba'i bye brag dang ldan pa la'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhes bya ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su dbang bskur ba'i bye brag dang ldan pa la'o //
translated: This is the accomplishment of the bodhisattva's meditative absorption.

original: de la thog ma nyid du slob pa ni spyod cing goms par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de la thog ma nyid du slob pa ni spyod cing goms par byed pa'o //
translated: Having attained it, he should abide in it.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sgrub pa zhes bya ba ni thob par byed pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sgrub pa zhes bya ba ni thob par byed pa'o //
translated: This is the attainment of the bodhisattva's meditative absorption.

original: ting nge 'dzin de'i 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de'i 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate the result of that meditative absorption,

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: it is said abiding in that meditative absorption... and so forth.

original: rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa'i ye shes kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad snang bar 'gyur ba dang / de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan sna tshogs kyi rnam pas brgyan pa thams cad kyang mthong bar 'dod pa dang /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa'i ye shes kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad snang bar 'gyur ba dang / de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan sna tshogs kyi rnam pas brgyan pa thams cad kyang mthong bar 'dod pa dang /
translated: By the wisdom of the fruitional consciousness, one wishes to see all the Bhagavat Buddhas dwelling in all the world systems of the ten directions, and all their Buddha-fields adorned with various qualities.

original: ji lta ji ltar de dag gi ming btags pa shes par 'dod pa dang / de dag la mchod pa bla na med pa zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa dang / rdzas dang / de bkod pa rnams kyis ji ltar dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mchod pa bsngags pa de ltar byed par 'dod pa dang /
analyzed: ji lta ji ltar de dag gi ming btags pa shes par 'dod pa dang / de dag la mchod pa bla na med pa zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa dang / rdzas dang / de bkod pa rnams kyis ji ltar dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mchod pa bsngags pa de ltar byed par 'dod pa dang /
translated: As for the phrase ‚Äúone wishes to make offerings to them,‚Äù this means that one wishes to make offerings to them in the manner praised by the Consecrated Bodhisattvas, with the performance, the substances, and the arrays.

original: de dag gi chos bstan pa la 'jug pa ni rtogs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de dag gi chos bstan pa la 'jug pa ni rtogs par byed pa'o //
translated: As for ‚Äúone wishes to engage in their teaching of the Dharma,‚Äù this means that one wishes to understand it.

original: mos par 'dod pas zhes bya ba ni nges par bye dpar 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: mos par 'dod pas zhes bya ba ni nges par bye dpar 'dod pa'o //
translated: As for ‚Äúone wishes to have conviction in it,‚Äù this means that one wishes to have certainty about it.

original: mi bslab pa'i tshul du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: mi bslab pa'i tshul du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: One should train in this perfection of wisdom as if in a training that is not a training.

original: nyid la zhes bya ba ni 'di kho na la tshul bzhin yid la byed pa so sor rtog pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis bslab pa kho na bya'o zhes gnyi gar nges par gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: nyid la zhes bya ba ni 'di kho na la tshul bzhin yid la byed pa so sor rtog pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis bslab pa kho na bya'o zhes gnyi gar nges par gzung bar bya'o //
translated: In this very [perfection of wisdom] means that one should train only in this very [perfection of wisdom] through the stages of correct mental attention, discernment, and so on. Both should be ascertained.

original: mi bslab pa'i tshul du zhes bya ba ni skye ba med pa 'di la bdag slob bo snyam du sems bskyed par mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: mi bslab pa'i tshul du zhes bya ba ni skye ba med pa 'di la bdag slob bo snyam du sems bskyed par mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: As if in a training that is not a training means that one should not generate the thought I am training in this non-arising.

original: de ni skye ba med pa 'di nyid zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gnyis kyi spyod yul dang gzugs brnyan yin no zhes nges par bya ba'i ched du /
analyzed: de ni skye ba med pa 'di nyid zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gnyis kyi spyod yul dang gzugs brnyan yin no zhes nges par bya ba'i ched du /
translated: In order to ascertain that this very non-arising is the domain of both shamatha and vipashyana,

original: bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'di la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi zhes dris te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'di la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi zhes dris te /
translated: the Blessed One is asked, Blessed One, why is it called the perfection of wisdom?

original: shes rab mchog tu gyur pa'i shes rab mchog nyid dang khyad par du gyur pa dang / dam pa nyid yin pa'i gtan tshigs gang yin zhe na lan du 'jam dpal ma skyes ma 'gags @75b pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shes rab mchog tu gyur pa'i shes rab mchog nyid dang khyad par du gyur pa dang / dam pa nyid yin pa'i gtan tshigs gang yin zhe na lan du 'jam dpal ma skyes ma 'gags @75b pa'i phyir /
translated: What is the reason for the supremacy of wisdom, the highest wisdom, and the most excellent wisdom?

original: de skad bya'o zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de skad bya'o zhes gsungs te /
translated: The reply is: ‚ÄúBecause Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´ is unborn and unceasing.‚Äù

original: de las gzhan mchog tu gyur pa'i gtan tshigs phyin ci ma log pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de las gzhan mchog tu gyur pa'i gtan tshigs phyin ci ma log pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: There is no other unmistaken reason for supremacy.

original: skye ba dang 'gag pa gnyis ni med bzhin du kun tu brtags pa yin pas log pa yin no //
analyzed: skye ba dang 'gag pa gnyis ni med bzhin du kun tu brtags pa yin pas log pa yin no //
translated: Since arising and ceasing are non-existent while being imagined, they are false.

original: de 'di nyid gsal bar byed pa ni gzod ma nas zhi ba la sogs pa yin te /
analyzed: de 'di nyid gsal bar byed pa ni gzod ma nas zhi ba la sogs pa yin te /
translated: This is clarified by ‚Äúpeaceful from the beginning,‚Äù and so on.

original: skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni gzod ma nas zhi ba dang 'byung ba med pa yin te /
analyzed: skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni gzod ma nas zhi ba dang 'byung ba med pa yin te /
translated: That which is unborn and unceasing is peaceful from the beginning and non-arisen.

original: nges par 'byung ba med pa dang bya ba med pa yin te /
analyzed: nges par 'byung ba med pa dang bya ba med pa yin te /
translated: It is without emergence and without activity.

original: byed pa med pa dang / de lta bu'i bdag nyid kyi dngos po med pa yin pa de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byed pa med pa dang / de lta bu'i bdag nyid kyi dngos po med pa yin pa de'i phyir ro //
translated: It is without agent and without such a nature.

original: bar gyi sgras rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs pa gzung ngo //
analyzed: bar gyi sgras rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs pa gzung ngo //
translated: The intermediate particle is to be taken as including ‚Äúcompletely beyond suffering by nature‚Äù and so on.

original: gang dngos po med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no zhes bya ba /
analyzed: gang dngos po med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no zhes bya ba /
translated: That which is non-existent is the perfection of wisdom.

original: skye ba med pa la sogs pa nas dngos po med pa la thug pa'i gtan tshigs kyi don de'i phyir na /
analyzed: skye ba med pa la sogs pa nas dngos po med pa la thug pa'i gtan tshigs kyi don de'i phyir na /
translated: The meaning of the reason, from ‚Äúnon-arisen‚Äù up to ‚Äúnon-existent,‚Äù is for that reason.

original: mjug sdud pa ni 'jam dpal gtan tshigs de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no zhes gsungs so /üîΩ// / bam po bdun pa ste tha ma'o //üîΩgang chos thams cad spyod yul ma yin pa de nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod yul yin te zhes gsungs pa la de nyid ces bya ba'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: mjug sdud pa ni 'jam dpal gtan tshigs de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no zhes gsungs so / // / bam po bdun pa ste tha ma'o // gang chos thams cad spyod yul ma yin pa de nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod yul yin te zhes gsungs pa la de nyid ces bya ba'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba'i phyir te /
translated: The conclusion is stated: ‚ÄúMa√±ju≈õrƒ´, for that reason, it is the perfection of wisdom.‚Äù

original: de nyid yin gyi gzhan byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin no //
analyzed: de nyid yin gyi gzhan byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin no //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthat which is not the domain of all phenomena is precisely the domain of the bodhisattva mahƒÅsattvas‚Äù is stated because the word ‚Äúprecisely‚Äù indicates that it is precisely that, and not something else, that is the domain of the bodhisattvas.

original: de ston par byed pa ni gang chos thams cad spyod yul ma yin pa zhes bya ba yin te /
analyzed: de ston par byed pa ni gang chos thams cad spyod yul ma yin pa zhes bya ba yin te /
translated: The one who teaches that is the one who says, ‚ÄúAll phenomena are not objects of activity.‚Äù

original: ma skyes pa'i phyir gzung bar bya ba med pa la shes pa dang / dmigs pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i phyir gzung bar bya ba med pa la shes pa dang / dmigs pa med pa yin no //
translated: Because they are unborn, there is no object to be apprehended, and there is no consciousness.

original: dmigs pa med pa'i ye shes 'di la de'i ngang du gyur par spyod na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod yul la zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi yul la zhugs pa zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: dmigs pa med pa'i ye shes 'di la de'i ngang du gyur par spyod na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod yul la zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi yul la zhugs pa zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: If one practices in that state, this is called ‚Äúengaging in the domain of activity of the bodhisattva mahƒÅsattva.‚Äù

original: 'di lta ste /üîΩspyod yul ma yin pa thams cad du song ba nyid spyod yul yin no zhes gsungs pa ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / spyod yul ma yin pa thams cad du song ba nyid spyod yul yin no zhes gsungs pa ni 'di lta ste /
translated: It is said,üîΩ‚ÄúThe domain of activity is the very non-domain of activity.‚Äù

original: spyod yul ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni spyod yul ma yin pa ni yul du byar med pa'o //üîΩthams cad du song ba ni spyod yul ma yin pa yin te /üîΩthams cad du song ba yod pas de thams cad du song ba yin te /
analyzed: spyod yul ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni spyod yul ma yin pa ni yul du byar med pa'o //üîΩthams cad du song ba ni spyod yul ma yin pa yin te /üîΩthams cad du song ba yod pas de thams cad du song ba yin te /
translated: The non-domain of activity is that which is not to be taken as an object.üîΩThe domain of activity is the very non-domain of activity.üîΩThe domain of activity is the very non-domain of activity.üîΩThe domain of activity is the very non-domain of activity.üîΩThe domain of activity is the very non-domain of activity.üîΩThe domain of activity is the very non-domain of activity.üîΩThe domain of activity is the very non-domain of activity.üîΩThe domain of activity is the very non-domain of activity.üîΩThe domain of activity is the very non-domain of activity.üîΩThe domain of activity is the very non-domain of activity.üîΩThe domain of activity is the very non-domain of activity.üîΩThe domain of activity is the very non-domain of activity.üîΩThe domain of activity is the very non-domain of activity.üîΩThe domain of activity is the very non-domain of activity.üîΩThe domain of activity is the very non-domain of activity.üîΩThe domain of activity is the very non-domain of activity.üîΩThe domain of activity is the very non-domain of activity.üîΩThe domain of activity is the very non-domain of activity.üîΩThe domain of activity is the very non-domain of activity.üîΩThe domain of activity is the very non-domain of activity.üîΩThe domain of activity is the very non-domain of activity.üîΩThe domain of activity is the very non-domain of activity.üîΩThe domain of activity is the very non-domain of activity.üîΩThe domain of activity is the very non-domain of activity.üîΩThe domain of activity is the very non-domain of activity.üîΩThe domain of activity is the very non-domain of activity.üîΩThe domain of activity is the very non-domain of activity.üîΩThe domain of activity is the very non-domain of activity.üîΩThe domain of activity is the very non-domain of activity.üîΩThe domain of activity is the very non-domain of activity.

original: chos thams cad kyi nang du song ba ni spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi nang du song ba ni spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not the domain of all dharmas.

original: @76a * // skye ba med pa ni spyod yul yin te /
analyzed: @76a * // skye ba med pa ni spyod yul yin te /
translated: Non-arising is the domain,

original: blo ldan rnams kyi spyod yul yin no //
analyzed: blo ldan rnams kyi spyod yul yin no //
translated: the domain of the wise.

original: chos thams cad mi dmigs pa na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod yul yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: chos thams cad mi dmigs pa na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod yul yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: When all dharmas are not apprehended, that is the domain of the bodhisattvas.üîΩWhy is that?

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes dogs pa la don de nyid gsal bar byed pa ni spyod yul 'di ni ma byas pa ste zhes bya ba yin te /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes dogs pa la don de nyid gsal bar byed pa ni spyod yul 'di ni ma byas pa ste zhes bya ba yin te /
translated: To clarify that meaning, it is said: This domain is not made.

original: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod yul 'di ni rgyu dang rkyen rnams kyis 'dus ma byas pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod yul 'di ni rgyu dang rkyen rnams kyis 'dus ma byas pa ste /
translated: Thus, the domain of the bodhisattvas is not conditioned by causes and conditions.

original: de'i phyir chos thams cad du song ba 'di ni spyod yul ma yin pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir chos thams cad du song ba 'di ni spyod yul ma yin pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, this domain of all dharmas is said to be not a domain.

original: de ltar spyod yul dang gzugs brnyan bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar spyod yul dang gzugs brnyan bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the domain and the reflection,

original: de la spyod pa bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la spyod pa bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: in order to teach practice in that,

original: bcom ldan 'das gang la spyad na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gang la spyad na /
translated: The bodhisattva said, Blessed One, practicing what

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: The bodhisattva mahƒÅsattva and so on are stated.

original: de la lan ni 'jam dpal shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad na zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te /
analyzed: de la lan ni 'jam dpal shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad na zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te /
translated: There, the answer is Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´, if one practices the perfection of wisdom and so on.

original: spyod pa'i ngang du gyur na /
analyzed: spyod pa'i ngang du gyur na /
translated: If one becomes habituated to practice,

original: myur du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: myur du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur gyi /
translated: one will quickly attain complete enlightenment.

original: 'phral la spyod pa de ni myur du ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'phral la spyod pa de ni myur du ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It means that immediate practice is not quick.

original: 'jam dpal bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te /
analyzed: 'jam dpal bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te /
translated: Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´, there is a samƒÅdhi called The Single Array and so on.

original: 'dir skye ba med pa la bzod pa'i phyir bzod pa dang / skad cig ma phyi ma la mngon par 'dod pa'i phyir 'dod pa dang / de ltar bsam pa'i phyir blo dang / rgyun du rtog pa'i phyir tshol ba dang / mngon du rtog pa'i phyir lta ba dag gi mtshan nyid gal te shes rab yin du zin kyang /
analyzed: 'dir skye ba med pa la bzod pa'i phyir bzod pa dang / skad cig ma phyi ma la mngon par 'dod pa'i phyir 'dod pa dang / de ltar bsam pa'i phyir blo dang / rgyun du rtog pa'i phyir tshol ba dang / mngon du rtog pa'i phyir lta ba dag gi mtshan nyid gal te shes rab yin du zin kyang /
translated: Here, if it is wisdom because it is patience due to accepting non-arising, desire due to desiring the subsequent moment, intelligence due to thinking in that way, seeking due to constantly conceiving, and view due to directly conceiving,

original: 'on kyang de la skye ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin spyod pa med par ni spyod pa'i bdag nyid la sogs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam pa gang gis ni 'bras bu shin tu rnam par dag pa mngon par byang chub
analyzed: 'on kyang de la skye ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin spyod pa med par ni spyod pa'i bdag nyid la sogs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam pa gang gis ni 'bras bu shin tu rnam par dag pa mngon par byang chub
translated: then even though it is wisdom, still, without the practice of the concentration of non-arising, the training in superior wisdom that is the practice of the perfection of wisdom, by which aspect will the extremely pure result of manifest enlightenment

original: par gang gis 'gyur bar byed pa'i lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa rnam par dag par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: par gang gis 'gyur bar byed pa'i lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa rnam par dag par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: be brought about? The pure training in superior wisdom will not occur.

original: de bas na de brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de bas na de brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, in order to express that,üîΩthe root text says:

original: ting nge 'dzin de la spyod na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de la spyod na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: If one practices that concentration, the bodhisattva mahƒÅsattva quickly attains the perfection of wisdom, and so on.

original: de dag gis ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gnyis ni myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i rgyu yin par bstan to //
analyzed: de dag gis ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gnyis ni myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i rgyu yin par bstan to //
translated: By those [verses], it is taught that both ≈õamatha and vipa≈õyanƒÅ are the cause for quickly attaining complete enlightenment.

original: de nyid las sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / @76b sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa la sogs pa'i yon tan yang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid las sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / @76b sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa la sogs pa'i yon tan yang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: From that very [text], the qualities such as serving the buddhas, maturing sentient beings, purifying the buddha realms, and fulfilling one's aspirations are also accomplished.

original: bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin yod de /
analyzed: bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin yod de /
translated: There is the one-pillared samƒÅdhi.

original: ting nge 'dzin de la spyod na zhes bstan gyi /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de la spyod na zhes bstan gyi /
translated: It is taught: If one practices that samƒÅdhi...

original: de la spyad pa'i rim pa ni ma gsungs te de'i phyir /
analyzed: de la spyad pa'i rim pa ni ma gsungs te de'i phyir /
translated: But the stages of practicing it are not explained, so [the text] says:

original: bcom ldan 'das bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la /
translated: Blessed One, in that one-pillared samƒÅdhi...

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar 'jug par bgyi zhes dris so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar 'jug par bgyi zhes dris so //
translated: The bodhisattva mahƒÅsattva asks, How should one enter?

original: gdul bya rnams spro ba bskyed par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: gdul bya rnams spro ba bskyed par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to inspire enthusiasm in those to be guided,

original: ci'i slad du bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bgyi zhes sgra 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan dris so //
analyzed: ci'i slad du bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bgyi zhes sgra 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan dris so //
translated: he asks the reason for the term, saying, Why is it called the samƒÅdhi of the single array?

original: re zhig spyod pa'i yul bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: re zhig spyod pa'i yul bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the domain of practice,

original: 'jam dpal bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba 'di ni skye ba med pa'i tshig bla dgas so zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: 'jam dpal bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba 'di ni skye ba med pa'i tshig bla dgas so zhes gsungs te /
translated: Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´, this so-called single array is a term for non-arising.

original: gcig kho na yin gyi gnyis pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gcig kho na yin gyi gnyis pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is only one, not a second.

original: tshogs mang po rnams so sor bkod pa ni bkod pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: tshogs mang po rnams so sor bkod pa ni bkod pa zhes bya ste /
translated: An array is called single when many assemblies are individually arranged,

original: dmag la sogs pa bkod pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dmag la sogs pa bkod pa bzhin no //
translated: like an army and so forth that are arrayed.

original: gcig gis nus pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gcig gis nus pa ma yin gyi /
translated: One alone is not capable,

original: mang po tshogs pa so sor bkod pa ma 'khrugs par 'khod pa rnams kyis /
analyzed: mang po tshogs pa so sor bkod pa ma 'khrugs par 'khod pa rnams kyis /
translated: but when many assemble and are individually arranged without disturbance,

original: dgos pa mang po sgrub par byed pa'i don gyi bkod pa dang chos mthun pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin kho na bkod pa yin pas /
analyzed: dgos pa mang po sgrub par byed pa'i don gyi bkod pa dang chos mthun pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin kho na bkod pa yin pas /
translated: Because it is similar to an array that accomplishes many purposes, only meditative stabilization is an array.

original: bkod pa gcig kho na yin gyi gnyis ma yin no //
analyzed: bkod pa gcig kho na yin gyi gnyis ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, there is only one array, not two.

original: gtan tshigs dris pa rnams gsal bar bya ba ni phyis bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs dris pa rnams gsal bar bya ba ni phyis bshad par bya'o //
translated: The questions about the reason will be clarified later.

original: nyi khri lnga stong pa las kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du //
analyzed: nyi khri lnga stong pa las kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du //
translated: The twenty-five thousand verse sutra also says that the Bhagavan taught this meditative stabilization as follows:

original: de la bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: What is the meditative stabilization called ‚Äúsingle array‚Äù?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas nas /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas nas /
translated: Abiding in that meditative stabilization,

original: chos gang yang gnyis su mi mthong ba 'di ni bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o zhes mdor bka' stsal to //
analyzed: chos gang yang gnyis su mi mthong ba 'di ni bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o zhes mdor bka' stsal to //
translated: one does not see any phenomenon as two. This is called ‚Äúthe meditative stabilization of single array.‚Äù

original: bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: A son of noble family who wishes to enter the meditative stabilization of single array

original: rigs kyi bu mos thog ma nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dri bar bya dgos te zhes bya ba 'dis ni log par thos pa dang / log par zin pa la sogs pa sel bar byed la /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mos thog ma nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dri bar bya dgos te zhes bya ba 'dis ni log par thos pa dang / log par zin pa la sogs pa sel bar byed la /
translated: The phrase Son or daughter of good lineage, first of all, one should ask questions about the perfection of wisdom eliminates wrong hearing, wrong understanding, and so on.

original: dris pa yang dag par zin dang / 'dor bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dris pa yang dag par zin dang / 'dor bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because one will then understand the questions correctly and will not be lost.

original: de ltar shes rab kyis legs par dpyad /üîΩlegs par bzung /
analyzed: de ltar shes rab kyis legs par dpyad / legs par bzung /
translated: Having thus well analyzed with wisdom,üîΩwell taken up,

original: legs par brtags /
analyzed: legs par brtags /
translated: well examined,

original: legs @77a * //üîΩpar khang du chud par byas la /
analyzed: legs @77a * // par khang du chud par byas la /
translated: well penetrated,

original: de nas de'i 'og tu bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de nas de'i 'og tu bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par 'gyur te /
translated: then after that one will enter the concentration of the single basis.

original: de rnam par mi rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan ni ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnam par mi rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan ni ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the non-conceptual image is the domain of concentration.

original: de ltar snga phyir nges pa ci'i phyir zhe na de'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar snga phyir nges pa ci'i phyir zhe na de'i phyir /
translated: Why is there a definite sequence?

original: 'jam dpal skye ba med pa ni mi 'khrugs pa ste zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: 'jam dpal skye ba med pa ni mi 'khrugs pa ste zhes gsungs te /
translated: Therefore it says, Manjusri, non-arising is unshakable.

original: 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul skye ba med pa ni rnam par rtog pa dpyad pa'i bdag nyid kyi rlung gis mi 'khrugs te /
analyzed: 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul skye ba med pa ni rnam par rtog pa dpyad pa'i bdag nyid kyi rlung gis mi 'khrugs te /
translated: Thus, the object of concentration, which is non-arisen, is not disturbed by the wind of conceptual analysis.

original: ma g-yos pa yin la /
analyzed: ma g-yos pa yin la /
translated: It is unmoved.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod yul ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod yul ni /
translated: The object of the perfection of wisdom

original: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa yang yin te /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa yang yin te /
translated: is conceptual,

original: dpyod par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dpyod par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is analyzed.

original: de yang ci'i phyir zhe na de'i phyir /
analyzed: de yang ci'i phyir zhe na de'i phyir /
translated: And why is that? Therefore it is said:

original: dkrug tu mi rung zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: dkrug tu mi rung zhes gsungs te /
translated: It cannot be disturbed.

original: gzhan gyis dkrug par 'os pa ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan gyis dkrug par 'os pa ma yin pa ste /
translated: It is not fit to be disturbed by another.

original: de bas na rtog pa dang bral ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de bas na rtog pa dang bral ba'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, because it is free from conceptualization,

original: dkrug tu mi rung ba'o //
analyzed: dkrug tu mi rung ba'o //
translated: it cannot be disturbed.

original: ci'i phyir rtog pa med ce na de'i phyir /
analyzed: ci'i phyir rtog pa med ce na de'i phyir /
translated: And why is it free from conceptualization? Therefore it is said:

original: dkrug par bya ba ma yin pa zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: dkrug par bya ba ma yin pa zhes gsungs te /
translated: It cannot be disturbed.

original: dkrug par bya ba'i dngos po 'di la yod pa ma yin pas dkrug par bya ba ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: dkrug par bya ba'i dngos po 'di la yod pa ma yin pas dkrug par bya ba ma yin pa'o //
translated: The thing to be disturbed is not present here, so it cannot be disturbed.

original: 'di thams cad ji ltar 'thad ce na de'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di thams cad ji ltar 'thad ce na de'i phyir /
translated: How is all this possible? Therefore it is said:

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes gsungs te /
translated: It is inconceivable.

original: sems par byed pas stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems par byed pas stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is empty of being an agent.

original: 'di'i gtan tshigs ni bsam par mi bya ba yin te /
analyzed: 'di'i gtan tshigs ni bsam par mi bya ba yin te /
translated: The reason for this is that it should not be reflected upon,

original: bsam par bya ba dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsam par bya ba dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is free from being an object of reflection.

original: bsam gyis mi lang ba yang yin te /
analyzed: bsam gyis mi lang ba yang yin te /
translated: It is also inconceivable,

original: sems par byed pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems par byed pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is free from being an object of thought.

original: bden pa'i mal stan rnams bsten par bya zhes bya ba ni theg pa dman pa yin la byed pas dben pa'i mal stan bsnyen par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: bden pa'i mal stan rnams bsten par bya zhes bya ba ni theg pa dman pa yin la byed pas dben pa'i mal stan bsnyen par bya ba yin te /
translated: One should resort to the bed of the truths means that one should resort to the bed of solitude, which is free from the activity of the Hinayana,

original: le lo'i go skabs kyi gnas yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: le lo'i go skabs kyi gnas yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the basis for the opportunity of laziness.

original: 'du 'dzi med pa la dga' bar yang byas la zhes bya ba ni theg pa dman pa'i gtam byed pa'i 'du 'dzi med pa de la dga' ba 'di yin pas 'du 'dzi med pa la dga' ba'o //
analyzed: 'du 'dzi med pa la dga' bar yang byas la zhes bya ba ni theg pa dman pa'i gtam byed pa'i 'du 'dzi med pa de la dga' ba 'di yin pas 'du 'dzi med pa la dga' ba'o //
translated: One should delight in solitude means that one should delight in the solitude of the Hinayana, which is the activity of the Hinayana.

original: phyi dang nang gi mtshan ma sna tshogs 'du shes kyi rgyu yin pa thams cad yid la mi bya ba ni 'di bsnyems pa med pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: phyi dang nang gi mtshan ma sna tshogs 'du shes kyi rgyu yin pa thams cad yid la mi bya ba ni 'di bsnyems pa med pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: One should not attend to any of the various external and internal signs that are the cause of the perception of multiplicity. This is called the absence of conceit.

original: des na yid la mi bya bar yang byas la zhes sbyar te /

translated: In order to teach the example of the immeasurable uninterrupted eloquence,

analyzed: 'jam dpal 'di lta ste /
translated: Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´, it is like this.

original: dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od zer gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od zer gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' dag kyang 'dzam bu'i gling la sogs pa'i mtha' yan chad 'od zer dag gis gsal bar ma gyur pa snang bar ma gyur pa med do //

original: 'jam dpal de bzhin du bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la brten cing zhugs nas zhes bya ba la brten pa 'di ni mos pas spyod pa'i sa'i tshe'o //
analyzed: 'jam dpal de bzhin du bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la brten cing zhugs nas zhes bya ba la brten pa 'di ni mos pas spyod pa'i sa'i tshe'o //
translated: ‚Äúrelies‚Äù refers to the stage of devoted engagement.

original: zhugs pa ni mthong ba'i lam gyi tshe'o //
analyzed: zhugs pa ni mthong ba'i lam gyi tshe'o //
translated: ‚ÄúEnters‚Äù refers to the path of seeing.

original: rnyed pa ni sa gsum gyi tshe ste /
analyzed: rnyed pa ni sa gsum gyi tshe ste /
translated: ‚ÄúObtains‚Äù refers to the stage of the three grounds.

original: 'od byed pa'i tshe ting nge 'dzin thob par rnam par 'jog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'od byed pa'i tshe ting nge 'dzin thob par rnam par 'jog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is posited that on the ground Luminous one obtains samƒÅdhi.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par bstan pa ma yin pa'i chos gang yang bstan pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par bstan pa ma yin pa'i chos gang yang bstan pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: There is no dharma whatsoever that is not taught in the perfection of wisdom.

original: gang la las 'di bzhin du shes na rtogs na /
analyzed: gang la las 'di bzhin du shes na rtogs na /
translated: If one understands and realizes it in this way,

analyzed: des skye ba med pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / 'gal zhing mi mthun par gyur ba'i chos gang yang mi mthong ngo //
translated: one will not see any phenomena that are contradictory and incompatible, such as nonarising, unarisen, and so on.

original: skye ba med pa nyid du gcig pa'i dpe ni /
analyzed: skye ba med pa nyid du gcig pa'i dpe ni /
translated: The example of the sameness in non-production is:

original: 'jam dpal 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'jam dpal 'di lta ste /
translated: Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´, it is like this:

original: dper na rgya mtsho chen po'i phyogs bzhi nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
analyzed: dper na rgya mtsho chen po'i phyogs bzhi nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
translated: For example, from the four directions of the great ocean, etc.

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la sogs pa rigs ma nges pa la thug pa sems can gyi rigs bzhi po phyogs bzhi dang 'dra ba rnams la /
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la sogs pa rigs ma nges pa la thug pa sems can gyi rigs bzhi po phyogs bzhi dang 'dra ba rnams la /
translated: In the same way, for the four types of sentient beings, from the bodhisattva type up to the unfixed type, like the four directions,

analyzed: ngas chos gang ci bstan pa de dag thams cad 'di lta ste /

original: skye ba med pa'i ro dang dngos po med pa'i ro kho nar gcig pa yin na /
analyzed: skye ba med pa'i ro dang dngos po med pa'i ro kho nar gcig pa yin na /
translated: only the taste of non-production and the taste of non-entityness.

original: sems can rnams kyi bsam pa tha dad pa'i dbang gis tha dad par @79b zin to zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi bsam pa tha dad pa'i dbang gis tha dad par @79b zin to zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: However, due to the power of the different thoughts of sentient beings, it is differentiated.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos ston pa 'dir skabs ma yin pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos ston pa 'dir skabs ma yin pa ma yin nam /
translated: Isn't this teaching of the BhagavƒÅn out of place here?

original: 'dir ci'i phyir bstan zhe na /
analyzed: 'dir ci'i phyir bstan zhe na /
translated: Why is it taught here?

original: bden te bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kho na'i gleng ba bstan par bya ba yin la /
analyzed: bden te bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kho na'i gleng ba bstan par bya ba yin la /
translated: True, but the discussion is to be taught only to the bodhisattva who has attained the concentration of the single procedure.

original: de yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'chad pa ting nge 'dzin de las byung ba dang tha mi dad do zhes bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas 'chad pa bstan pa nyes pa med do //
analyzed: de yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'chad pa ting nge 'dzin de las byung ba dang tha mi dad do zhes bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas 'chad pa bstan pa nyes pa med do //

original: de bas na dpe gong mas bye brag tu byas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa yang 'dir dpe yin no //
analyzed: de bas na dpe gong mas bye brag tu byas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa yang 'dir dpe yin no //
translated: Therefore, the Tathagata, distinguished by the above example, is also the example here.

original: de nyid kyi phyir don kyang gnyis su sbyar ba yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir don kyang gnyis su sbyar ba yin te /
translated: For that very reason, the meaning is also applied in two ways.

original: 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa de yang chos gang dang gang ston par 'gyur ba de thams cad ro gcig pa kho na ston par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa de yang chos gang dang gang ston par 'gyur ba de thams cad ro gcig pa kho na ston par 'gyur te /
translated: Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´, the son of the family, who abides in this concentration, he will teach all dharmas as having only one taste,

original: 'di lta ste /

analyzed: rgya mtsho la chu len pa'i skyes bu bzhin du rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa de yang chos gang dang gang ston pa de thams cad skye ba med pa dang / dngos po med par ro gcig pa kho na ston pa yin gyi gzhan ma yin no //
translated: Just as a person who takes water from the ocean will find that all the water has one taste, the son of good family who dwells in this meditative absorption will find that all the teachings he gives are of one taste, in that they are exclusively non-arisen and insubstantial.

original: 'jam dpal de bzhin du rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas nas gang ci ston pa de thams cad kyang ma skyes pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / dngos po med pa kho na ston par gyur ro zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'jam dpal de bzhin du rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas nas gang ci ston pa de thams cad kyang ma skyes pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / dngos po med pa kho na ston par gyur ro zhes bya ba la /
translated: Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´, in the same way, the son of good family who dwells in this meditative absorption will find that all the teachings he gives are exclusively non-arisen, non-originating, and insubstantial.

original: de bzhin du zhes bya ba ni rigs kyi bu de de bzhin gshegs pa bzhin du yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du zhes bya ba ni rigs kyi bu de de bzhin gshegs pa bzhin du yin te /

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas nas gang ci ston pa de thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa mdzad pa bzhin du /

original: ma skyes pa dang skye ba med pa dang dngos po med pa ston pa yin no //
analyzed: ma skyes pa dang skye ba med pa dang dngos po med pa ston pa yin no //
translated: It shows the unborn, non-arising, and non-entityness.

original: de bas na de lta bu'i rnam pa ma skyes pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / dngos po med pa kho na zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de bas na de lta bu'i rnam pa ma skyes pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / dngos po med pa kho na zhes bya ba la /

original: de kho na zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du zhes bya ba'i don yin no //
analyzed: de kho na zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du zhes bya ba'i don yin no //
translated: Here, thatness means just that.
